jāṅgale sādhāraṇe vā deśe yathākālaṃ śiśirātapapavanasalilasevite same śucau pradakṣiṇodake śmaśānacaityadevayajanāgārasabhāśvabhrārāmavalmīkoṣaravirahite kuśarohiṣāstīrṇe snigdhakṛṣṇasuvarṇamadhurasurabhimṛttike mṛdāvaphālakṛṣṭenupahatenyairbalvattarairdrumairbheṣajāni praśasyanta iti sāmānyato bhūmiparīkṣā ||
viśeṣatastvaśmavatī sthirā gurvī śyāmā kṛṣṇā sthūlatṛṇavṛkṣasasyaprāyā svaguṇabhūyiṣṭhā |
mṛdvī samā śvabhravatyavyaktarasajalā mahāparvatavṛkṣā śyāmā cākāśaguṇabhūyiṣṭhā |
tatrāmbupṛthivīguṇabhūyiṣṭhāsu bhūmiṣu jātāni virecanāni bṛṃhaṇāni ca śasyante |
atha maṅgalācāraḥ kalyāṇavṛttaḥ śuciḥ śuklavāsāḥ sampūjya ca devatāmaśvinau gobrāhmaṇāṃśca kṛtopavāsaḥ prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā gṛhṇīyāt |

gṛhītvā cānurūpaguṇavadbhājanasaṃsthānyagāreṣu pūrvottaradvāreṣu nivātapravātaikadeśeṣu nityapuṣpopahārabalikarmavatsvagnisalilopasvedadhūmarajomūṣikacatuṣpadāmanabhigamanīyāni svavacchannāni śikyeṣvāsajya sthāpayet ||
kṣīraṃ bāṣkayaṇaṃ grāhyaṃ viṇmūtraṃ tacca nīrujām |

tatra bhedyānyauṣadhānyaṇuśo bhedayitvā chedayitvā chedayāni prakṣālyodakena śucaurūkṣāyāmadhaḥpraliptāyāṃ tāmrāyomṛnmayānyatamāyāṃ sthālyāṃ samāvāpya bahvalpapānīyagrāhitāmauṣadhānāmākalayya yāvatā muktarasatā syāt tāvadudakamāsecayecchoṣayecca |
athāgnāvadhiśritya mahatyāsane sukhopaviṣṭaḥ sarvataḥ satatamavalokayan darvyāvaghaṭṭayan mṛdunā paritaḥ samupagacchatānalena sādhayet |
kṣīrādisahitaṃ ca dravyaṃ na samyaṅmuktarasaṃ bhavatīti vārikvāthapūrvakaṃ kṣīrādyaistadupadeśe anupadagdhaṃ kvāthayet ||
tatra samyagrasavīryādīnyauṣadhasya samīkṣya vyādhyāturādibalataśca niryāsādīnāṃ kalpanāṃ mātrāṃ ca saṃśrayet ||
mātrāyā na vyavasthāsti vyādhiṃ koṣṭhaṃ balaṃ vayaḥ |
ālocya deśakālau ca yojyā tadvacca kalpanā ||
snehapāke tvanirdiṣṭapramāṇe samuditasya dravasya pādena sneho yojyastatpādena kalkaḥ ||
tatra yadā viramati śabdaḥ prasādamāpadyate sneho yathāsvaṃ varṇagandharasotpattirbhaiṣajyamaṅgulībhyāṃ mṛdyamānamanatimṛdvanatidāruṇamanaṅguligrāhi ca syāt |
lehasya tantumattāpsu majjanaṃ saraṇaṃ na ca ||
athāvatārya śītībhūtamahatena vāsasā paripūya śucau dṛḍhe kalaśe samāsicyāpidhānena pidhāya śuklena vastrapaṭṭenāvacchādya sūtreṇa subaddhaṃ svanuguptaṃ śucau deśe susthitaṃ sthāpayet ||
karṣasya suvarṇamakṣaṃ picurbiḍālapadakaṃ pāṇitalaṃ tindukaṃ kavalagrahaḥ ṣoḍaśikā ca |
tulā punaḥ palaśataṃ tāni viṃśatirbhāra iti |
kiñcit sīdati kṛṣṇe ca vartyamāne tu paścimaḥ |
mṛdurnasye kharo 'bhyaṅge pāne bastau ca cikkaṇaḥ ||
atha kvāthyeṣu teṣūktaṃ toyādanyat drava bhavet ||
dravaṃ yattatra paṭhitaṃ kṣīraṃ vā dadhimastu vā ||
anirdiṣṭe pramāṇe tu kvāthyānāṃ ca dravasya ca |
dravyāṇāṃ syāt palaṃ vāpi dviprasthamudakasya tu ||
hīnaṃ vāpi tataḥ kāryamevaṃ yūṣe ca pānake ||
kaṣāya eva cettatra dravārthaṃ kevalo bhavet |
kaṣāyeṇaiva cet sādhyaḥ satyanyasmin drave tathā ||
kvāthyaṃ tu bheṣajaṃ snehādatra pakṣe caturguṇam |
kriyate dviguṇaṃ kvāthyaṃ tataḥ snehāt prayujyate ||
dravāṇāṃ dviguṇaṃ prasthaṃ śuṣkāt prasthādyato mataḥ |
caturguṇaṃ dravaṃ snehādyatra yat paṭhyate dravam |
anukte tu drave deyaṃ jalameva caturguṇam ||
kaṣāyasya tu peyasya yadi vā kalkacūrṇayoḥ |
vaidyaiḥ prāyeṇa na tathā yaḥ ṣoḍaśaguṇodakaḥ ||
mātrāṃ tu vaidyāḥ kvāthasya pāyayanti catuṣpalām |
vādhituṃ śakyate naiva jñāpakaṃ cātra vidyate |
śāstre kuṣṭhe ca mātrā sā mahatī samprakāśitā |
catuṣpalā kaṣāyasya mātrā yā bhiṣajāṃ matā ||
pale caturguṇajale sā mātrā na prasidhyati |
evaṃ sati ca sādhyaṃ syādbheṣajānāṃ catuṣpalam ||
pātavyā ṣaṭpalā mātrā tasya dravyapalāni ṣaṭ ||
na ṣaṭpalāni kvāthyante na ca toyaṃ caturguṇam ||
jvarādīnāṃ kaṣāyeṣu sneheṣveva hi sā matā ||
pūrvaṃ prasthavyapekṣā yā proktā vijñāpake sati ||
ghṛtaṃ muktvā kaṣāyasya proktā mātrā catuṣpalā ||
dravyāṇāṃ ca palaṃ kvāthyaṃ paṭolādye prakīrtitam ||
tat ṣoḍaśaguṇe toye yadi na kvāthyate tataḥ ||
śuṣkāṇāṃ ca dravāṇāṃ ca samaṃ tu kuḍavādadhaḥ |
naivāñjalau na prasṛte na pale na palādadhaḥ |
te ca kaṣāyāṣṭapale catuṣpalaṃ sarpiṣaśca paktavyam |
palasya dviguṇe māne kriyamāṇe na yujyate ||
dviguṇe hi pale tat syādekameva palāṣṭakam |
catuṣpalaṃ ca dātavyaṃ yat proktaṃ saha sarpisā ||
eṣā mātrā dviguṇitā dviguṇe prasṛte bhavet ||
pibet saṃmūrchitaṃ tena gulmaḥ śāmyati paittikaḥ ||
aṣṭau pratyekametāni syuḥ ṣoḍaśa palāni tu |
teṣveva dviguṇaṃ mānaṃ na sarveṣūdghṛteṣu hi |
ārdrāṇāmeva teṣāṃ hi prayogaḥ śasyate yataḥ |
nai tatra dviguṇaṃ mānaṃ bhiṣagbhiḥ kaiścidāśritam |
kvāthauṣadhānāṃ mānaṃ ca proktaṃ noktaṃ jalasya tu ||
pramāṇaṃ tu tathā noktaṃ snehasyoktaṃ na vā bhavet ||
tulyaṃ kvāthena dātavyaṃ tatra kṣīrādikaṃ dravam |
kartavyaṃ ca tathā tat syādyathā snehāccaturguṇam ||
evaṃ vai dviguṇe snehāt triguṇe ca prakīrtite ||
kaṣāyaḥ paṭhyate yatra pramāṇaṃ cāsya noditam ||
tatrāpi ca prayoktavyaṃ snehāt kvāthaṃ caturguṇam ||
bahūni yatra paṭhyante kvacit snehe dravāṇi hi |
bahūnāmapi teṣāṃ ca parimāṇaṃ na paṭhyate ||
kvāthyāni yāni tānyatra pākyāḥ śataguṇe jale ||
atha khalu jātamātrameva bālamulbāt saindhavasarpiṣā mārjayet ||

tato 'syātiprabalamohajvaraparītasarvagātrasya krośitumapi rujānurūpamasamarthasyānavasthitāśeṣadehadhātorasambhāvyayauvanādyavasthasya krakacasparśamiva karavasanaśayanasaṃsargaṃ manyamānasyāvikalpitamaṅgāni vikṣipataḥ punariva maraṇamanubhavato līyamānasaṃjñasyātisambādhayonipuṭāvapīḍitaprāṇapratyānayanāya balātailena pariṣekaṃ kuryāt |
yadi vāceṣṭa eva syāttataḥ kṛṣṇakapālikayā śūrpeṇa cainamabhiniṣpunīyāt |
ātmā vai putranāmāsi sa jīva śaradāṃ śatam ||
pratyāgataprāṇasya ca prakṛtibhūtasya nābhinālaṃ nālābhibandhanāccaturaṅgulasyordhvaṃ kṣaumasūtreṇa badhvā tīkṣṇena śastreṇa vardhayet |
tataḥ kṣīravṛkṣakaṣāyeṇa sarvagandhodakena vā taptatapanīyarajatanirvāpaṇakavoṣṇena kapitthapatrakaṣāyeṇa vā tadvidhena snāpayet ||
tato 'sya suparilikhitanakhayā suprakṣālitopavānayā kārpāsapicvavaguṇṭhitayā dakṣiṇapradeśinyā jihvauṣṭhakaṇṭhamanusukhaṃ pramṛjyāt |
tataścaindrībrāhmīśaṅkhapuṣpīvacākalkaṃ madhughṛtopetaṃ hareṇumātraṃ kuśāgrābhimantritaṃ sauvarṇenāśvatthapatreṇa medhāyurbalajananaṃ prāśayet |
tṛtīye 'hni caturthe vā strīṇāṃ stanyaṃ pravartate ||
tasmāt prathame 'hanyanantāmiśrite madhusarpiṣī mantrapūte trikālaṃ prāśayet |
tataḥ prāṅnivāritastanyasya svapāṇitalasammitaṃ sarpirdvikālaṃ dāpayedanantaraṃ ca stanyamiṣṭataḥ ||
prākśirasaṃ cainaṃ kṣaumanicaye saṃveśayeducchīrṣake cāsyābhimantritamudakumbhaṃ sthāpayet dvārapakṣayośca ||
kumārasya ca saha mātrā kaṇṭhe ucchīrṣake ca |

athāsya samānavarṇā madhyamavayāḥ śuciralolupā nibhṛtānāturā jīvadvatsā vatsalā dakṣiṇā brahmacāriṇyavyaṅgā bahukṣīrā śuklāmbarācarā dīrghadrasvādidehadoṣāṣṭakarahitā alambordhvacucūkātipīnahanistanadoṣamuktā yuktacūcukā dhātrī syāttasyā eva stanyaṃ pibet ||
taccodakapātre duhyamānamekatāṃ yadudakena saha gacchati vakṣyamāṇadoṣarahitaṃ ca tacchuddhamārogyabalajananam ||
atha dhātrī snātānuliptā nityamahatavāsāḥ sumanāḥ prajāsthāpanauṣadhīḥ śirasā bibhrāṇā prāṅmukhī stanaṃ prāgdakṣiṇaṃ dhautamīṣatparisrutaṃ pāyayet ||
stanyajananāni tu madyāni śīdhuvarjyānyānūpamāṃsāni dravāḥ svādvamlalavaṇaprāyāścāhārāḥ kṣīriṇyaścauṣadhayaḥ kṣīrapānamanāyāsaḥ saumanasyaṃ ca ||
na tu kṣudhitaśokārtaśrāntakruddhapraduṣṭadhātuṃgarbhiṇīviruddhāhārabhuktānāṃ stanyaṃ pāyayennājīrṇauṣadhaṃ ca bālamiti |
daśame dvādaśe vāhni gotrācāraiḥ śubhaiḥ śubhe |
sūtā snānotsavaṃ kuryāt pitāpatyasya nāma ca ||
maṅgalyamantarantasthaṃ na duṣṭaṃ na ca taddhitam ||
bodhayet sahasā suptaṃ no na cainaṃ samutkṣipet |
hastābhyāṃ grīvayā mūrdhnā viśeṣāt satataṃ vacām |
na garbhiṇyāḥ pibet stanyaṃ pārigarbhikakṛddhi tat ||
stanyābhāve payaśchāgaṃ gavyaṃ vā tadguṇaṃ pibet |
svāheti mantreṇānena pratyahaṃ ca tataḥ param |
bhajedyathā yathācānnaṃ stanyaṃ tyājyaṃ tathā tathā |
nordhvaṃ na pārśvato nādhaḥ sirāstatra hi saṃśritāḥ ||
varti stryahāttato rūḍhaṃ vardhayeta śanaiḥ śanaiḥ |
nājīṇa na malodreke na cātyuṣṇe 'pi vardhayet |
surūḍhaṃ ca punarvidhyat tvarayā tu vivardhanāt ||
chidyeta pālī śuddhasya śuddhāsrāṃ sandadhīta tām |
pūrvoktaṃ yojayet kṣīramannaṃ ca laghu bṛṃhaṇam ||
trāsayennāvidheyaṃ ca trastaṃ gṛhvanti hi grahāḥ |
anuśiṣyāt sadā cainaṃ dharmāya vinayāya ca ||
ebhiḥ kṣīraghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ lihyāt bālo ghanātyaye |
rakṣoghnaṃ ca viṣaghnaṃ ca sārasvatamidaṃ ghṛtam |
vayasthā pippalī kuṣṭhaṃ haridrā sārivā vacā |
trividho hi bālaḥ prāguktastatra kṣīrapasya kṣīramaduṣṭaṃ prayuñjīta |
kṣīraṃ hi yathoktairdoṣakopanairāhāravihārairdhātryā vyāpannaṃ vividhāmayodayāya bālasya prakalpate ||
tatra śyāvāruṇavarṇaṃ tiktakaṣāyānurasaṃ viśadaṃ rūkṣamalakṣyagandhaṃ phenilamatṛptikaramādhmānamūtravarcovibandhakṛt karśanamapsu visarpati vicchinnaṃ ca plavate vātaduṣṭam ||
kṛṣṇanīlatāmrāvabhāsaṃ tiktāmlakaṭukānurasaṃ kuṇaparudhiragandhi bhṛśoṣṇamapsu pītarājimadvidāhakaraṃ ca pittaduṣṭam ||
atyarthaśuklamadhuraṃ lavaṇānurasaṃ ghṛtatailavasāmajjagandhi picchilaṃ bahalaṃ tantumat guru salile 'vasīdati nidrābahulaṃ ca śleṣmaduṣṭam ||
sa yaṃ pradeśamabhīkṣṇaṃ spṛśati sparśaṃ ca na kṣamate tatra rujamupalakṣayet ||
mūtrasaṅgatṛṇmūrcchotrāsadigvīkṣaṇakhallīhastapādastambhakubjībhavanakeśaluñcanairbastau guhye ca sarvatra ca svabhā vātiriktarodanena mukhavikūṇanena ca ||
atha yathāmayaṃ yathādoṣaṃ ca dhātryāḥ śamanaśodhanāni prayuñjīta ||

tatra vātadūṣite stanye devadārusaralakaṭurohiṇīvacākuṣṭhapāṭhābhārṅgīmāgadhikāvṛścikālīcitrakājamodaśuṇṭhīmarīcānāṃ kvāthaṃ daśamūlakvāthaṃ vā trirātraṃ pāyayitvā vātavyādhivihitānāṃ sarpiṣāmanyatamaṃ nigadamadirānupānaṃ dadyādvātaharadravyasiddhaṃ vā |
tiktānurasaṃ stanyaṃ mudgamāṣapalāśābhyāṃ kākolīyugalena ca śodhayet |
phenilaṃ vicchinnaṃ plavamānaṃ ca bilvāgnimanthaśṛtena payasā haviṣā ca |
ebhireva ca dravyaiḥ sarpīṣi pittaghnāni ca virecanāni śītāṃścābhyaṅgapradehasekān kuryāt ||
saindhavamadhukasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vā madanapuṣpakalkena ca sakṣaudreṇa stanaṃ bālasya coṣṭhamālimpet |
yadā punardhātrī sannipātaprakopanānyāseveta tadasyāstrayo malā yugapadvakṣo 'bhiprapannāḥ kṣīravahā rasāyanīḥ samanusṛtya saṅgīrṇaliṅgaṃ stanyamāvahanti |
taccedavijñānāt satatamapratyavekṣaṇāt pramādādvā mātuḥ kumāraḥ pibati tataḥ sa tena salilopamamacchaṃ vicchinnamāmaṃ durgandhi nānāvarṇavedanaṃ phenilamatisāryate |
tatra dhātrīṃ bālaṃ ca pūrvamevāśu vāmayet |
tehyatibālye dantotpādavedanayātipīḍitā na samyak sampūrṇadhātubalā bhavanti ||
tadā ca tayorasampūrṇavīryatvāt punaḥ kālāntareṇa dantānāṃ patanamāpūryamāṇadhātutvācca punarutthānamata eva ca vṛddhānāṃ na punardantotpattiḥ ||
sirāṇāṃ punaranutpādaḥ etena rogacyutā api prāyaśo vyākhyātāḥ ||
tau tu dhātū kālakrameṇa pacyamānau yadā dantāśayamanuprapadyete tadāsya kiñcidutsedhenordhvādhodantamāṃsasaṅghaṭṭanādaṅgaharṣo jāyate |
tadgatena ca śleṣmaṇā kaṇḍūstayā cūcukaṃ daśyate |
tataḥ sa kaphānuviddho 'sthimajjasthitaḥ sarvato visaran saha pittena dhātūn malāṃśca dūṣayan vividhānyathoditānupadravānabhinirvartayati ||
yadā punardantamāṃsāśrayī kevalo vikṛtaḥ prabalo 'nilaḥ sapitto vāsthimajjānau śoṣayati tadā dvijānāmasambhava eveti |
dantodbhede ca bālānāṃ na hi kiñcinna dūyate ||
ta eva doṣā dūṣyāśca jvarādyā vyādhayaśca yat |
pīto jvaramatīsāraṃ tṛṣṇāṃ chardiṃ ca nāśayet ||
gavādanīṃ dāḍimaṃ ca tṛḍvān koṣṇāmbhasā pibet ||
kṣīriṇāṃ ca pravālāni pāṭhā ca vipacet ghṛtam |
tat pītaṃ samadhu śleṣmajvaraghnaṃ dīpanaṃ param ||
tiktayā ca ghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ samakṣīraṃ vyapohati |
pītaṃ pītaṃ vamati yaḥ stanyaṃ taṃ madhusarpiṣā |
śākhābhyāṃ hṛdayaṃ yāti hṛdayādvā gudaṃ vrajet |
sadanto jāyate yastu dantāḥ prāgyasya cottarāḥ ||
kurvīta tasminnutpāte śāntiṃ taṃ ca dvijataye |
dadyāt sadakṣiṇaṃ bālaṃ naigameṣaṃ ca pūjayet ||
nāvamārohayet bālaṃ snātaṃ skandhaṃ gajasya vā |
hanti prayuktaṃ tat kāle rogān pāribhavāśrayān ||
pītaṃ pītaṃ ca yaḥ stanyaṃ savātamatisaryate |
tat prayojyaṃ guru snigdhaṃ yaccātyagnau pureritam ||
vṛkṣaṃ cānu tataḥ kuryāt bhūṣaṇavyatyayaṃ tayoḥ |
śiraḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ tato muṣkau tataḥ pādau ca yo rujet |
gṛhṇāti sūtikāgāre na stanaṃ cet spṛśettataḥ |
rudate trasyate vāpi lehaṃ dadyāt sukhāvaham ||
ulbakaṃ sahajaṃ vyādhimambupūrṇaṃ ca taṃ vadet ||
pāṇḍurogaṃ ca vātotthaṃ svasthavṛtte ca puṣṭidam ||
sthito muhūrtaṃ dhauto 'nu pītastaṃ taṃ jayet gadam ||
skande 'tha yauvanaṃ prāpte senāpatyaṃ ca tān grahān |
haradhvaṃ teṣu bālānāmārogyaṃ dhāri śarma ca ||
śuddhena dehaṃ bālānāṃ gandharvā iva yoṣitām ||
teṣāṃ grahiṣyatāṃ rūpaṃ pratataṃ rodanaṃ jvaraḥ ||
ūrdhvaṃ nirīkṣya hasanaṃ madhye vinamanaṃ jvaraḥ |
bastagandho jvaraḥ śoṣaḥ purīṣaṃ haritaṃ dravam |
udare granthayo vṛttā yasya nānāvidhaṃ śakṛt |
jihvāyā nimnatāmadhye śyāvaṃ tālu ca taṃ tyajet ||
tatra hiṃsātmake bālo mahān vā srutanāsikaḥ |
kṣāmo mūtrapurīṣaṃ svaṃ mṛdnāti na jugupsate ||
apsu majjet patet kūpe kuryādanyacca tadvidham |
rakaṃ ca sarvamārgebhyo 'riṣṭotpattiṃ ca taṃ tyajet ||
graheṣu sādhyeṣu śiśuṃ vivikte śaraṇe sthitam |
śuklaṃ puṣpaṃ balirdhūpo dūrvā śvetāśca sarṣapāḥ ||
yamo vaivasvato rājā ye ca tasyānucāriṇaḥ ||
dīrghamāyurarogaṃ ca tava dāsyanti svasti te |
svasti te bhagavān brāhmā svasti nāradaparvatau ||
svasti vedāśca yajñāśca agnīṣomau ca svasti te |
svasti rudro viśākhaśca skandaḥ śaktidharaśca te ||
svasti dhātā vidhātā ca suparṇaśca mahābalaḥ |
svasti devāśca yakṣāśca mā ca te pāpamāgamat ||
kṛsaro yāvakaḥ kṣaudraṃ palalaṃ lavaṇaṃ haviḥ |
gandhaṃ mālyaṃ phalaṃ hema dhūpaḥ sapurakunduruḥ ||
vṛtte vā caturasre vā maṇḍale kusumojvale ||
taṃ prati prāṅmukho vidyāṃ paṭhannupaharet balim ||
prajāpatau ca yat satyaṃ yat satyamamareśvare |
dharmarāje ca yat satyaṃ yacca satyaṃ tapasviṣu ||
dhanādhite ca yat satyaṃ yacca satyaṃ jalādhite |
baliṃ copahṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sarve kaumārakā grahāḥ |
aulā nīlā khalā kālā nakulā grahakārikā ||
senā susenā mātā ca mahāsenā yaśasvinī |
śarastambhaśca te mudrā mucyatāṃ mātaraḥ śiśuḥ |
gandhaṃ dhūpaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca kumāraste prayacchati ||
na sthātavyaṃ tadāghrāya svāṃ gatiṃ gaccha mā ciram |
ṣammukho dvādaśākṣo vai tasmin kāle vṛto varam |
sthānāt cyutaḥ sa vai kṣipraṃ bāhyaḥ pariṣado bhavet ||
tvaṃ hi yajñaśca yūpaśca tvaṃ hi dharmavatāṃ gatiḥ |
hiraṇyaretā devastvaṃ tvaṃ hi vedavidāṃ gatiḥ ||
haripradhānagatirāsīdimaṃ nigṛhya guhyakamutsādaya tejasā tvaṃ mama vaśyaṃ ca taṃ kuru duṣṭagrahanivāraṇaṃ sarvopadraveṣu ca ||
tvayā kṛtena homena śīghraṃ śāntiḥ prajāyate |
āyāhi vahne devānāṃ tvaṃ hi vaktraṃ purātanam |
tena satyena deveśa imaṃ sādhaya me graham ||

namo 'stute havyavāhana daṇḍaṃ pradarśaya daha daha darśa darśa teja teja moṭaya moṭaya apasmāramudghāṭaya kumāra piśācarevatīrodanatrāsana vitrāsana kampana utkampana vijṛmbhaṇa devayakṣagandharvabhūtanāgarākṣasasantajana daṇḍanāvidhūsārayabhagavannagnidaṇḍa agnivīrya namastejasāsvenatyaktamutsādaya svāhā |
puṣye mūle ca bālasya snānaṃ parvadineṣu ca ||
śaṅkhaṃ ca dakṣiṇāvartaṃ śrīvatsaṃ mālyadāma ca |
aṣṭau ghaṭāḥ ṣoḍaśa vā dvātriṃśadviguṇā api |
yamo dadātu bhagavān vaijayantaṃ tu nāmataḥ ||
gadā te nāśayatvadya sarvapāpaṃ diśo daśa ||
āpaḥ pavitraṃ lokesminnāpo vai paramaṃ śuciḥ |
bālā dākṣāyaṇī sītā sāvitrī saramā dyutiḥ |
oṃ maṃ oṃ maṃ lmi lmi libhuk libhuk lipibhavanebhyaḥ svāhā ||
puṣkaraṃ puṣkarāraṇyaṃ naimiṣaṃ ca tathā gayā |
api tā nihatāḥ sarvā yāścānyāḥ pāpacintakāḥ ||
satīnāṃ kapilānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ caiva tejasā |
aśubhaṃ yacca te kiñcit sarvaṃ pratihataṃ mayā ||

skandagrahe guggulvelavālukamanaśśilāharitālamañjiṣṭhośīrarāsnāgarudevadāruśrīveṣṭakahareṇūgirikadambakacandanaiḥ ślakṣṇapiṣṭaiḥ pradeho vātaharavṛkṣapatrakvāthena kavoṣṇena pariṣekasteṣāmeva ca mūlakvāthe sarvagandhasurāmaṇḍakaiḍaryāvāpavattailaṃ vipakvamabhyaṅgaḥ ||
kṣīrivṛkṣakaṣāyeṇa kṣīreṇa ca siddhamardhapalikaiśca piṣṭaiḥ sārivādvikākolīdvibalāṃśumatīdvayahastikarṇaparṇairghṛtaprasthaṃ pānam ||
somavallīndravallīśamībilvavṛndākamṛgādinīmūlāni sūtreṇa grathitāni kaṇṭhena śirasā vā dhārayet ||

raktamālyānulepanavastrapatākāmaṇibījairvividhaiśca bhakṣyaiḥ sadadhighṛtamadhulājakulmāṣamāṃsamatsyasurāsavaṃ samayūrakukkuṭaṃ saghaṇṭākaṃ saśūrpavyajanaṃ ca kumāragrahe raktaudanena balimupoṣito nivedayet ||
tatra ca rātrāvagniṃ jvālayitvā mantramimaṃ paṭhan madhusarpiṣā juhuyāt ||
viśeṣataḥ skandagrahe trirātraṃ ca rātrau rātrau gāyatryabhimantritodakena catvare dhātrīkumārayoḥ snapanamācaret ||
trikālaṃ ca mantreṇānena bālamapamārjayet pratisarāṃ ca badhnīyāt ||
tapasāṃ tejasāṃ caiva yaśasāṃ vapuṣāṃ tathā |
vidhātā yo 'vyayo devaḥ sa te skandaḥ prasīdatu ||
devadevasya mahataḥ pāvakasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ |
gaṅgomākṛttikānāṃ ca sa te śarma prayacchutu ||
viśākhe skandagrahokto vacākuṣṭhānvitaḥ pradeho golomībilvaśirīṣamustasurasādikvāthena pariṣekaḥ |
kṣīrivṛkṣakaṣāyeṇa jīvanīyagarbhaṃ sapayaskaṃ sarpiḥ siddhaṃ pānam |
naigameṣe viśākhoktaḥ pradehognimanthavaruṇanalarohiṣapūtīkapāribhadrakaiḥ pariṣeko dhānyāmlena sabījena guggulvaśvagandhāsarṣapośīraśvetākuṣṭhaśatāhvāvipakvaṃ tailamabhyaṅgaḥ ||
bilvakapitthakarañjatarkārīsurasapāṭalīvaraṇapāribhadrakapārijātamātuluṅgapatrakvāthena rātrau pariṣeko bilvādibhireva ca tailaṃ surābastamūtrayuktaṃ sādhitamabhyaṅgaḥ ||
triphalāṃśumatīdvayapayasyāmadhukakalkena daśamūlaniryūhe sakṣīraṃ sarpiḥ pakvaṃ pānam |
gṛddhrolūkavānararomāṇi saghṛtāni tatpurīṣaṃ vā suptajane dhūpo vacādibhirvā pradehoktaiḥ pūrvokto vā |
surāsavaguḍāpūpapiṣṭatilakṛtabhakṣo vṛkṣamūle savṛṣabhaḥ kāñcanākṣiyugayuktaḥ svayaṃ pitrā kumārasya nirvāpaṇīyo baliḥ |
yaḥ pitā sarvabālānāṃ grahāṇāṃ pūjito varaḥ |
vṛkṣamūle kṛtāvāsaḥ sa tvāṃ pātu pitā sadā ||

kṣīritarubhiḥ pariṣeko mārkavamūlakāmalakītvakpatrapriyaṅgumanaśśilālailādvayayaṣṭīkramukalodhradhātakīsārivāñjanotpalapataṅgasamaṅgādviharidrāmāṃsīmañjiṣṭhācandanapadmakasuvarṇagaurikaistailaṃ sapayaskaṃ pakvamabhyaṅgo grahahā vraṇaropaṇaśca ||
kāśmaryapṛśniparṇīlodhramadhukairmadhuravargeṇa ca samakṣīraṃ sarpiḥ śṛtaṃ prāśyamānaṃ śītapūtanāṃ chardihidhmākāsaśvāsāṃśca śamayati ||
syandanasyonākakāśmaryakhadirakuṣṭhairmadhuravargeṇa ca kṣīrivṛkṣakaṣāye sakṣīraṃ śṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ madhuyuktaṃ cakṣuḥkāmopasṛṣṭānāṃ prāśaḥ |
bilvairaṇḍakapitthāgnimanthavaṃśīkuberākṣīpatrakvāthena pariṣekasteṣāmeva ca svarasena madhukavājigandhāgarbhamaikadhyaṃ tailaṃ vasā ca pakvamabhyaṅgaḥ ||
ebhireva ca vipakvamājaṃ ghṛtaṃ payo vā pibet ||
mātuścāsya śleṣmaharamauṣadhaṃ pāne stanodvartane ca yuñjyāt ||
revatī śuṣkanāmā ca sā te devī prasīdatu iti ||
sarvo 'pi ca prāyeṇāhārakāmā niśārdhavicāriṇo bhayānakā māṃsāsṛgvasāśinaḥ ||
teṣāṃ punaranupraveśe kāraṇaṃ sadyaḥ pūrvakṛto vā viśeṣeṇa prajñāparādhaḥ ||
tena hi kāmakrodhalobhamohādijanitena praluptadhamabhinnavratācāraśauco malīmasaḥ pūjyānatikrāmannātmānamupahanti ||
tatra śīlavantaṃ cokṣācāraṃ śuklāmbaradharaṃ tapaḥsvādhyāyaparaṃ prāyaḥ śuklapratipaditrayodaśyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā devā gṛhṇanti |
krodhanaṃ kadaryamātmasambhāvinaṃ kularūpagarvitaṃ kṛṣṇadvādaśyāṃ kṛṣṇatrayodaśyāṃ sandhyayoścāsurāḥ |
priyanṛttagītavāditragandhamālyāmbaraṃ paradārarataṃ cokṣācāraṃ prāyaścaturthyāmaṣṭabhyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca gandharvāḥ |
svapnaśīlaṃ capalamanimitrakrodhanamarthasiddhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ prāyaḥ pañcabhyāṃ sandhyayormadhyāhne ca nāgāḥ |
satvabalarūpagandharvadhanaśauryayuktaṃ mālyānulepanahāsyapriyamativyākaraṇaṃ prāyaḥ śuklasaptamyāmekādaśyāṃ ca yakṣāḥ ||

svādhyāyatapovratacaryādevayatigurupūjārataṃ bhraṣṭaśaucaṃ vā brāhmaṇamabrāhmaṇaṃ vā brahmavādinaṃ śūraṃ māninaṃ devāgārasalilakrīḍanapriyaṃ ca skhalitabrahmacaryaṃ prāyaḥ śuklapañcamyāmaṣṭamyāṃ pūrṇacandradarśane sandhyāsu ca |
hīnasatvaṃ piśunaṃ stenaṃ lubdhaṃ śaṭhaṃ prāyo dvitīyātṛtīyāṣṭamīṣu rākṣasapiśācādayaḥ |
kalipānapriyamasūyāvantaṃ paruṣabhāṣiṇaṃ bahvāśinaṃ ca kṛṣṇanavamīdvādaśyorniśi ca rākṣasāḥ ||
ātmaślāghinaṃ kūṭasākṣyapradaṃ paropatāpinaṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ piśācādayaḥ ||
tadvidhameva ca prāyaḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ ca guruvṛddhasiddhāḥ |
devagobrāhmaṇatapasvināṃ hiṃsārucitvaṃ nṛśasābhiprāyatā kopanatvamaratirojovarṇacchāyābalavapuṣāṃ copataptiḥ svapne devādibhirbhatsanaṃ pravartanaṃ ca ||

tatra saumyadṛṣṭiṃ gambhīramapradhṛṣyamakopanaṃ śucimanidraṃ bhojanānabhilāṣiṇamalpasvedamūtrapurīṣavācaṃ saṃskṛtavādinaṃ devadvijagurubhaktaṃ śuklamālyāmbarasaritpulinaśailoccabhavanadadhikṣīrasurabhipriyaṃ cirādakṣiṇī nimīlayantaṃ varapradātāraṃ śubhagandhaṃ varcasvinaṃ phullapadmopamamukhaṃ devagraheṇa gṛhītaṃ vidyāt ||
tatrāpi govṛṣamiva nadantaṃ dīptamukhanayanamādīptena svareṇa sarvamābhāṣamāṇamīśvareṇa |

jihmadṛṣṭiṃ duṣṭātmānaṃ krodhanamatṛptaṃ sasvedagātraṃ devabrāhmaṇagurudveṣiṇaṃ nirbhayamabhimāninaṃ śūraṃ vyavasāyinaṃ rudro 'hamindrohamupendro 'haṃ skando 'haṃ viśākho 'hamityādi bhāṣamāṇaṃ vikṛtavācamasakṛddhasantaṃ surāmiṣaruciṃ dantairnakhaiśca parān hiṃsantamasureṇa ||
svācāraṃ hṛṣṭātmānaṃ śubhagandhamalpavyavahāraṃ nṛtyantaṃ gāyantaṃ mukhavādyāni kurvantaṃ priyodyānapulinaraktavastrasnānamālyānulepanadhūpānnapānahāsalīlāśṛṅgārakathāgāndharvaṃ gandharveṇa |
tatrāpi śiro dhunānaṃ kalahaṃ kurvantaṃ saṃrambheṇa jāgarūkaṃ paṭhantaṃ hasantaṃ hasanena ||

krodhanamaniśaṃ viśvasantaṃ bhramantamātapatrāt trasyantaṃ raktākṣaṃ stabdhadṛṣṭiṃ jihvāṃ lolayantaṃ sṛkviṇyau lihānamadhomukhaśāyinaṃ calaṃ vakragāminaṃ bilamavalokya sarpavadūrdhvaṃ prasarantaṃ jalaughaghanadundubhisvanairhṛṣyantaṃ kṣīraghṛtaguḍamadhusnānamālyapriyaṃ gātrāṇi kampayantaṃ dantaiḥ khādantaṃ jale 'vatīrṇamuttaraṇamanicchantamurageṇa ||

asakṛt svapnarodanahāsanṛtyagītapāṭhakathānnapānasnānamālyadhūpagandharaktavastraratiṃ raktatrastaviplutākṣaṃ drutaṃ sagarvaṃ mattamiva gacchantaṃ vastrāntamutkarṣayantaṃ calitāgrahastaṃ bahubhāṣiṇaṃ strīlolupaṃ madyāmiṣapriyaṃ sannahya śastraṃ mṛgayamāṇamatibalamavyathaṃ hṛṣṭaṃ tuṣṭamalparoṣaṃ kiṃ kasmai dadāmīti vādinaṃ śubhagandhaṃ varcasvinaṃ dvijātivaidyaparibhāvinaṃ rahasyabhāṣiṇaṃ yakṣeṇa ||
tatrāpi hṛṣitaromāṇamūrdhvekṣaṇaṃ prahṛṣṭanayanaṃ caṇḍaṃ paruṣaṃ mahāninādaṃ maṇivareṇa |

hāsanṛttapriyamākrośinaṃ pradhāvinaṃ devadvijabhiṣagdveṣiṇaṃ mantravedaśāstrābhidhāyinaṃ kāṣṭhaśastrādibhiścātmānamāghnantaṃ chidraprahāriṇaṃ vaidyarandhrānveṣiṇaṃ bhoḥśabdavādinaṃ paruṣaṃ raudraceṣṭaṃ śīghragāminaṃ brahmarākṣasena |
tatrāpi vikṛtasvaraṃ bhāṣayantamutrāsayantaṃ brahmavādinaṃ saṃskṛtabhāṣiṇaṃ bahuśastoyaṃ yācantaṃ yajñasenena ||

sakrodhadṛṣṭiṃ bhrukuṭimudvahantaṃ bhairavāsyaṃ tvaritamabhidhāvantaṃ ruvantaṃ sasaṃbhramaṃ praharantaṃ naṣṭanidraṃ niśāvicāriṇamannadveṣiṇamanāhāramapyatibalinamannakāle hasantaṃ nirlajjaṃ śūraṃ roṣaṇamapriyavādinamaśuciṃ srīmadyamāṃsaraktamālyapriyaṃ raktamāmiṣaṃ vā dṛṣṭvoṣṭhau parilihantaṃ dīnaṃ śaṅkitaṃ dhāvantamakasmādrudantaṃ hasantaṃ gāyantaṃ nṛtyantaṃ nirarthakaṃ paribhāṣamāṇaṃ rākṣasena |
bhinnagadgadakaṇṭhamaṅgāni bhañjayantaṃ jihvāṃ parilihānamakṣamālayā japamānaṃ śaucamabhīkṣṇaṃ kurvāṇaṃ saṅgamena |
meghavidyududayāyāsate krudhyantaṃ jalavṛṣṭiṃ samantānmanyamānaṃ śakaṭaniṣpīḍinaṃ vidyunmālinā |

asvasthacittaṃ naikatra tiṣṭhantaṃ paridhāvinaṃ dayitanṛtyagītahāsocchiṣṭamadyamāṃsaśūnyanivāsaratiṃ purastādabhighnantaṃ nirbhatsanāddīnaśaṅkitavadanaṃ nakhairātmavapuṣi likhantaṃ naṣṭasmṛtiṃ baddhābaddhabhāṣiṇamakasmādrudantaṃ duḥkhānyāvedayamānamudhvastarūkṣadehasvaraṃ durgandhamaśuciṃ nagnaṃ malinaṃ rathyācailatṛṇābharaṇaṃ saṅkarakūṭakāṣṭhāśvārohiṇaṃ lolaṃ bahvāśinaṃ piśācena |
tatrāpi bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭvā hasantaṃ visvaraṃ krośantaṃ nityabhītaṃ kaśmalena |
vaidyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kupyantaṃ bhramadbhojinaṃ bahvāśinaṃ bhasmaguṇṭhanaśayanaṃ striyo mārge rundhānaṃ mūtrapurīṣavimardinaṃ nistejasā |
nagnaṃ dhāvantamakasmādaśmakāṣṭhādi gṛhītvā bhramantaṃ tṛṇacīramālyanivasanamutrastadṛṣṭiṃ paruṣābhidhāyinaṃ śmaśānaśūnyaikavṛkṣarathyāniṣeviṇaṃ tilānnamadyāmiṣasaktadṛṣṭiṃ kākhordena ||
aprasannadṛṣṭiṃ calannetrapakṣmāṇaṃ śaṅkitekṣaṇaṃ dīnavadanaṃ saṃśuṣkatāluṃ nidrāluṃ pratihatavācamapasavyavastramalpāgnimarocakinaṃ tilaguḍapāyasamāṃsaruciṃ ca pitṛgraheṇa ||
abhyaṅge ca prayoktavyameṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ ca dhūpane ||
mañjiṣṭhāṃ dve niśe kṛṣṇāṃ bastamūtreṇa peṣayet |
vayasthā hiṅgu kaṭukā ṣaḍgranthā saindhavaṃ tathā ||
siddhaṃ siddhārthakaṃ nāma pāne nasye ca yojitam |
bījaṃ karañjāt kusumaṃ śirīṣāt phalaṃ ca valkaṃ ca kapitthavṛkṣāt ||
samāṇimanthaṃ sanataṃ sakuṣṭhaṃ syonākamūlaṃ kiṇihī sitā ca |
bastasya mūtreṇa subhāvitaṃ tat pittena gavyena guḍān vidadhyāt ||
grahā gṛhṇanti ye yeṣu teṣāṃ teṣu viśeṣataḥ |
śvetapatraṃ ca lodhraṃ ca tagaraṃ nāgasarṣapāḥ |
harītakī haridre dve laśuno maricaṃ vacā |
toyasya kumbhaḥ palalaṃ chatraṃ vastraṃ vilepanam ||
ebhireva ghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ gavāṃ mūtre caturguṇe |
piśācānāṃ baliḥ sīdhuḥ piṇyākaḥ palalaṃ dadhi |
ṛte piśācāt sarveṣu pratikūlaṃ ca nācaret |
mahāvidyāṃ ca māyūrīṃ śucistaṃ śrāvayet sadā ||
tatronmādo nāma ya unmārgagaiḥ śārīramānasairdoṣairmanaso madaḥ ||

teṣāṃ punarunmārgagatve hetuḥ śamalaṃ vikṛtopahitamahitamanucitamannapānavidhinirapekṣamāhārajātamatyupakṣīṇadehānāṃ vyavāyavyādhivegasamudgame viṣamaśarīraceṣṭopasevā devadvijagurūllaṅghanaṃ vā rāgadveṣajanitābhirādhibhirmanovighāto viṣopaviṣagaropayogo vā ||
ebhirhīnasatvasya manasyupahate buddhau pracalitāyāmatyudīrṇatvāddoṣāḥ prakupitā hṛdayamupasṛtya manovahāni srotāṃsyāvṛtya janayantyunmādam ||

tatra śirasaḥ śūnyatā cakṣuṣorasvasthatvaṃ svanaḥ karṇayorucchvāsādhikyamāsyasaṃsravaṇamannānabhilāṣo 'rocako 'vipāko hṛdayagraho 'sthāne dhyānāyāsasammohodvegāḥ satataṃ romaharṣo jvaro 'bhīkṣṇamunmattacittatvamudarditvamarditākṛtikaraṇaṃ vyādheḥ svapne ca darśanamabhīkṣṇaṃ bhrāntacittacalitānavasthitānāmapraśastānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ tilapīḍakavaccakrādhirohaṇaṃ vātakuṇḍalikābhirunmathanaṃ nimajjanaṃ kaluṣāṇāmambhasāmāvarteṣu cakṣuṣoścāpasarpaṇāmiti doṣanimittānāmunmādānāṃ pūrvarūpāṇi |
tataśca deho hatasārathiriva ratho 'karṇadhāra iva cāpsu plavaḥ sukhaduḥkhācāradharmādharmapralupto 'kasmād bhramati ||

tatravātādasthānasmitahasitanṛttagītavāditravāgaṅgavikṣepavāgbhedabhrū vikṣeparodanakrośanāsphoṭanāni paryaṭanamajasramāsyāt phenāgamo yānamayānairalaṅkaraṇamanalaṅkārikairdravyairlobho 'bhyavahāryeṣu labdheṣu cāvamānastīvraṃ mātsaryaṃ kārśyaṃ pāruṣyamutpiṇḍitāruṇākṣatā jīrṇe 'nne cātibalavatvam ||

pittāt krodhaḥ santarjanamakasmānmuṣṭiloṣṭakāṣṭhaśastrairabhidravaṇaṃ nagnatā pracchāyaśiśirābhirātirudakābhilāṣaḥ santāpaḥ pītāvasraṃsanamanimittamanalajvalanopaśaṅkāhni tārakādarśanaṃ tāmraharitahāridrasaṃrabdhākṣatvaṃ ca ||

kaphādalpavākceṣṭāhāratvamarocako vamathuruṣṇasevā lālāsiṅghaṇakasravaṇaṃ rahaḥ kāmatā strīpriyatvaṃ nidrābībhatsatvaṃ śaucadveṣaḥ śvayathurāsye śuklastimitamalāvilākṣatā bhukte rātrau ca balavatvamiti |
yuñjyāttāṃni hi śuddhasya nayanti prakṛtiṃ manaḥ ||
dvau prasthau svarasātbrahmyā ghṛtaprasthaṃ ca sādhitam |
pāṇḍukaṇḍūviṣe śoṣe mehe mohe jvare gare |
jaṭilā pūtanā keśī cāraṭī markaṭī vacā |
rāsnāṃ viṣaghnāṃ laśunaṃ viśalyāṃ surasaṃ vacām ||
tiktakaṃ jīvanīyaṃ ca sarpiḥ snehaśca miśrakaḥ ||
vidhyet sirāṃ yathoktāṃ vā tṛptaṃ medyāmiṣasya vā |
tena yāti śamaṃ tasya sarvato viplutaṃ manaḥ |
baliṃ ca dadyāt palalaṃ yāvakaṃ saktupiṇḍikām |
catuṣpathe gavāṃ tīrthe nadīnāṃ saṅgameṣu ca ||
hate sattve hṛdi vyāpte saṃjñāvāhiṣu kheṣu ca ||
pānaṃ tailasya madyasya tayoreva ca mehanam ||
tatra vātāt sphuratsakthiḥ pratataṃ ca muhurmuhuḥ |
apasmarati saṃjñāṃ ca labhate visvaraṃ rudan ||
apasmarati pittena muhuḥ saṃjñāṃ ca vindati |
kapilānāṃ gavāṃ pittaṃ nāvanaṃ paramaṃ hitam |
pitteṣu sādhitaṃ tailaṃ nasye 'bhyaṅge ca śasyate ||
bastamūtre hitaṃ nasyaṃ cūrṇaṃ vādhmāpayet bhiṣak ||
vyoṣaṃ ca bastamūtreṇa piṣṭvā vartīṃ prakalpayet |
tadeva sarpiṣā yuktaṃ dhūpanaṃ paramaṃ hitam ||
srotāṃsi cāsya śudhyanti smṛtiṃ saṃjñāṃ ca vindati ||
vartmasandhiṃ sitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ vā sarvamakṣi vā ||
rogān kuryuḥ calastatra prāpya vartmāśrayāḥ sirāḥ |
vimardanāt syācca śamaḥ kṛcchronmīlaṃ vadanti tamū ||
vimuktasandhi niśceṣṭaṃ hīnaṃ vātahataṃ hi tat ||
karoti kaṇḍūṃ dāhaṃ ca pittaṃ pakṣmāntamāśritam |
pakṣmaṇāṃ śatanaṃ cānu pakṣmaśātaṃ vadanti tam ||
pothakyaḥ piṭakāḥ śvetāḥ sarṣapābhā ghanāḥ kkaphāt |
raktaṃ raktena tatsrāvi cchinnaṃ cchinnaṃ ca vardhate ||
madhye vā vartmano 'nte vā kaṇḍūṣārugvatī sthirā |
kṛchrabodhe purāṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ drākṣākalkakvāthasiddhaṃ śarkarāvacūrṇitaṃ rātrau pāyayet |
vātaharadravyakalpitāṃśca bastīn kṣīrasvinnaireraṇḍapallavaiḥ svedaṃ ca vartmanām ||
1AS.Utt.12.4 kumbhīkāpiṭakāsu vartma likhitvā saindhavenānupratisārya paṭolāmalakamadhukakvāthena secayet ghṛtena ca ||
likhite ca vartmani srutarakte yaṣṭyāhvaniryūheṇa prakṣālanam |
kākajaṅghā rohita matsyamāṃsaṃ ca kākaśoṇitabhāvitamantardhūmaṃ dagdhaṃ cūrṇāñjanaṃ kuryāt ||
pothakīrvilikhya śuṇṭhīsaindhavamāgadhikācūrṇaiḥ pratisārya prakṣālya coṣṇāmbhasā khadirasārāḍhakīśigrupatrakaṣāyeṇa secayet |
utsaṅgapiṭakāmañjananāmikāṃ ca bhitvā niṣpīḍya collikhitāṃ tagarailāsaindhavanepālīcūrṇena sakṣaudreṇa pratisārayet |
vedanāyāṃ tu kuṣṭhaguḍūcīkalkodakena saguḍakṣaudreṇa pariṣeko mūrdhānaṃ cāsyakaṭutailenābhyajya pāṭhākalkena pralipyārjunabilvanirguṇḍīmārkavatarkārīsairyakakārpāsīmālatīpatraniryūheṇa secayet ||
pakṣmoparodhe samupacitaṃ vartma lekhanenotkliṣṭaṃ raktaṃ visrāvaṇena saśophaṃ śirovirekakavalavamanairyāpayet ||
pravṛddheṣu tu romasu viśuddhadehasya sahiṣṇorbhruvodhastāddvau bhāgau pakṣmāntāt bhāgamekaṃ samutsṛjya yavamātraṃ tadākṛti tiryak chedayedārdravāsasā ca raktaṃ gṛhṇīyāt ||
tatstanubhūte rakte kṣaumasūtreṇa bālena vā dhanurvakrayā sūcyā mudgamātrāntaraiḥ padaiḥ sīvyet |
tato 'sya lalāṭe paṭṭaṃ badhvā tatsīvanasūtraṃ tatra sūcīpadairnātigāḍhaślathamāsajjet |
vraṇavedanāyāṃ vastrabaddhena yaṣṭīmadhukacūrṇena saṃskṛtaṃ sarpiḥ pariṣeko vaṭādikvaṣāyāśca sakṣīrāḥ |
pañcame ṣaṣṭhe vāhani sthirībhūteṣu śastrapadeṣu sīvanasūtramavalambakācchitvāpanayet |
tatra mṛduḥ svedaḥ snaihikaṃ ca nasyam ||
nirbhujya vā vartmadoṣopahatāṃ valīṃ vilikhya tumburuvakrakuśābhayābījānyatamakalkena pratisārayet kṣāreṇa vā dahettaprayā vā śalākayā ||
upapakṣmāṇi tu lākṣārasena lakṣayitvā sandaṃśenoddhṛtya tanusūcyagreṇāgnivarṇena romakūpān dahet |
na sraṃsate calati vā vartmaivaṃ sarvatastataḥ ||
striyāḥ kṣīre chagalyā vā mṛditaṃ netrasecanam ||
vāyuḥ kruddhaḥ sirāḥ prāpya jalābhaṃ jalavāhinīḥ |
kaphāt kaphāsrave śvetaṃ picchilaṃ bahalaṃ sravet ||
tāmrā mudgopamā bhinnā raktaṃ sravati parvaṇī ||
purāṇaṃ viṣamaṃ madhye vicchinnaṃ yacca śukrakam |
upanāhaṃ bhiṣak svinnaṃ vrīhimukhena bhitvā maṇḍalāgreṇa samantāllekhayet |
kṛmigranthiṃ karīṣeṇa svinnaṃ bhitvā vilikhya ca kāsīsasaindhavatriphalāmākṣikaiḥ pratisārayet ||
viśeṣatastilanālān yavanālān vā haritaśalākānardhamāsamajākṣīreṇa bhāvayitvā śoṣayitvā ca dāhayet |
stanyānvitaṃ vā kāsīsaṃ kṣaudradrutaṃ vā kāsīsasaindhavamarjune mātuluṅgarasena saśarkareṇāścyotanaṃ mastunā vā ||
sphaṭikakuṅkumaśaṅkhanābhimadhuyaṣṭikā vā kṣaudrārdrāstadvadvā rasāñjanaṃ kāsīsaṃ vā ||
arma tu pañcavidhamapi yattanuraktaṃ dhūmāvilaṃ dadhinibhaṃ vā tacchukravat kāyaśirovirekalekhanāñjanairupācaret ||

athetarasmin snigdhasyāturasya peyāvilepijāṅgalarasānyatamāśitasya kṛtasvastyayanasya sukhaśayanagatasyottānadehasya kiñcidavākśirasaḥ sukhoṣṇāmbuplutatāntavasvinnanayanasya saindhavena sabījapūrakarasenāñjayitvāṅguṣṭhakena nimīlitamakṣi vimṛdgīyādābalāsagrathitarūpotpatteḥ |
itthaṃ ca saṃroṣitākṣasya pracalite 'rmādhimāṃsake niścalaṃ paricārakaḥ śirodhārayet ||
anyaśca vāmadakṣiṇānyatarapārśve 'nukūlaṃ sthito dṛḍhavastragarbhābhyāmaṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ vartmanī nikṣipet |

atha vaidyaḥ kanīnakāt pravṛddhe 'rmaṇyapāṅgamakṣimāṇasya yatra yatra valī jāyate tatra tatrārma baḍiśena mucuṭyā vā nātyāyataṃ gṛhītvā kiñcidunnamya kṛṣṇaśuklamaṇḍalābhyāṃ sarvataḥ sūcyagreṇa mokṣayitvā kiñcidāñchet |
atha tīkṣṇena maṇḍalāgreṇa vṛddhipatreṇa vā vilikhya kanīnakaṃ copānīya kanīnakasamameva caturbhāgaśeṣaṃ chindyāt |
yattu jālavadarma vyāpi tadeṣiṇyā yāvatkanīnakamanusarannunmocyonnamayya pūrvavat chindyāt |
tadvadapāṅgāt pravṛddhe kanīnakamīkṣamāṇasya yāvadapāṅgaṃ copanīyāpāṅgasamameva tathā yāvadvarjayedapāṅgaṃ sirāścetyādi |
tataḥ plotena raktaṃ viśodhya samyak chinnamavekṣya saindhavacūrṇena punaḥ punaḥ pratisārayedyavanālabhasmanā vā plotaśuddhaṃ ca punarmadhunā |
tataḥ śītāmbu pariṣiktaṃ sarpiṣā sukhoṣṇena pariṣicya madhughṛtāktaṃ pūrvavat badhnīyāt |
mūrdhni pādayoścāsmai śatadhautaghṛtaṃ śītāṃśca pradehān dadyāt ||
dvitīye cāhni sāyaṃ prātarmadhukasarpiṣā koṣṇena śirastathāvabaddhameva cākṣi siñcet |
pañcāhaṃ coṣṇodakānupānaṃ sarpiḥ pītvā jīrṇe pathyamaśnīyāt ||
tṛtīye divase vimucya karañjabījasiddhena kṣīreṇākṣi svedayet |
lodhramadhukakiṃśukapaṭoladviharidrākoraṇḍamukulakvāthena madhumiśreṇāścyotayet saptame 'hani sarvathā muñcet ātapākāśadarśanaṃ ca pariharet ||
saśophe tu netre dhūmaḥ śirovirecanaṃ ca |
tilān sulikhitān madhukakākolīsuniṣaṇṇakapañcamūlaśarkarāśrutaśīte payasi saptāhaṃ bhāvitāṃstenaiva payasā pīḍayet |
tattailamebhirevauṣadhaiḥ payasā cāṣṭaguṇena siddhaṃ nāvanādaśrurāgaghnaṃ dṛṣṭiprasādanaṃ ca kṛṣṇagate tu vraṇe vraṇaśukravat kriyā |
sirājāle sirā yāstu sthūlāḥ kaṭhināścatā baḍiśena gṛhītvā maṇḍalāgreṇollikhet ||
tatra vraṇaśukre trivṛnniryūheṇa trirvipakvaṃ sarpiḥ pāyayet |
madhukakākolīmṛdvīkotpalavidārīkvāthena mañjiṣṭhākṣīrakākolīmadhukakvathitājakṣīreṇa vā saśarkareṇāścyotayet śītaiścāsya śirovaktraṃ dihyāt siñcecca |

vaiḍūryasphaṭikaśaṅkhamuktāvidrumarūpyāyastraputtāmrasīsālamanaśśilākukkuṭāṇḍatvaksamudraphenarasāñjanasaindhavairajāpayaḥpiṣṭairvartayaśchyāyāśuṣkāḥ kṣaudraghṛṣṭāḥ prātaḥ sāyaṃ ca prayuktā vraṇaśukranudaḥ |

tatra tarpaṇaṃ mṛgaviṣkirapiśitaṃ kāśmaryasuniṣaṇṇotpalamṛṇālaśṛṅgāṭakaśerudrākṣākṣīravidārījīvanīyāṃśca kṣīreṇa pācayet tasmānnavanītamuddhṛtya candanamadhuśarkarānantānīlotpalakalkairaṣṭaguṇena ca payasā vipakvaṃ pūrvavadyojayet ||
puṭapākaṃ ca kukkuṭamuddhṛtāntraṃ veśavārīkṛtya candanasārivāmadhukaśarkarānantānīlotpalaprapauṇḍarīka jīvanīyakalkaiḥ samadhughṛtaiḥ saṃsṛjya prāgiva kalpayet |
śirovirecanadravyavipakvaṃ vā tailaṃ marśaḥ pratimarśo vā ||
aśāmyati tu śukre sarvatra punaḥ punaryathoktameva paryāyeṇa yojayet |
śaṅkhaṃ tāmre stanyena ghṛṣṭaṃ saghṛtairyavaiḥ śamīpatraiśca dhūpayet anena sandhāvāñjanenāñjayet |
tadvat suvarṇaṃ rūpyamayo va ghṛṣṭaṃ saghṛtairbadarīpatrairdhūpitamañjanam |
śaṅkho nistuṣāśca haritamudgāḥ piṣṭā vartiśrūrṇo vā madhuyukto 'ñjanaṃ śukragharṣaṇam |
masūrā nistuṣāḥ stanyapiṣṭāstaruṇadarbhāṅkurā ghṛtamājaṃ gokṣīraṃ śaraścāyase tāmreṇa ghṛṣṭaṃ pratyañjanaṃ vedanāghnam |
yavagodhūmajīvanīyamāṃsīcūrṇena saghṛtaśarkarotkārikā svedopanāhe praṇītā vedanāmapanayati śukraṃ cotsādayati |
utsannaṃ vā saśalyaṃ vā śukraṃ bālādibhirlikhet puṭapākena vā |
añjanaṃ cāsya prapauṇḍarīkamadhukaharidrāloharajoñjanabṛhatīkṣīrakākolīrajāpayaḥpiṣṭā yavairghṛtayuktairāmalakīpatraiśca paryāyeṇa dhūpitā vartiḥ ||
ajakāṃ pārśvato vidhvā sūcyā visrāvya codakam |
vraṇaṃ gomāṃsacūrṇena baddhaṃ baddhaṃ vimucya ca |
snehāñjanaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nasyaṃ ca kṣīrasarpiṣā |
nityaṃ ca śukreṣu śṛtaṃ yathāsvaṃ pāne ca marśe ca ghṛtaṃ vidadhyāt |
na hīyate labdhabalā tathāntastīkṣṇāñjanairdṛk pratataṃ prayuktaiḥ ||
bhūtaṃ tu yatnādāsannaṃ dūre sūkṣmañca nekṣate ||
dṛṣṭiḥ pittena drasvākhyā sā drasvā drasvadarśinī |
kaphena timire prāyaḥ snigdhaṃ śvetañca paśyati |
kācena raktā kṛṣṇā vā dṛṣṭistādṛk ca paśyati |
nakulāndhaḥsa tatrāhni citraṃ paśyati no niśi ||
sthagayanti dṛśaṃ doṣā doṣāndhaḥ sa gadoparaḥ ||
rātrāvāndhyaṃ ca jāyeta vidagdhoṣṇena sā smṛtā ||
dhūmāvilāṃ dhūmadṛśaṃ dṛśaṃ kuryuḥ sa dhūmaraḥ ||
gavyaṃ ghṛtaṃ loharajo bhājane bādare sthitam |
lohapātre sthitaṃ māsaṃ māṣarāśau ca bhakṣayet ||
prātarbhaktasya vā pūrvamadyāt pathyāṃ pṛthak pṛthak |
nīlotpalaṃ viḍaṅgāni phenaṃ ca saritāṃ pateḥ ||
saptarātre gate bhūyaḥ piṣṭaṃ kṣīreṇa vartayet |
vasāñjane ca vaiyāghrī vārāhī vā praśasyate |
sośīraiḥ sādhitaṃ sarpiḥ sakṣīraṃ tarpaṇaṃ hitam ||
sadārvīkaiḥ payo yuktaṃ siddhaṃ tailaṃ ca nāvanam ||
dṛgvaimalyāya vimalā vartiḥ syāt kokilā punaḥ ||
piṣṭaiḥ kṣīridrumakvāthe ghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ ca tarpaṇam ||
tatsrutaṃ saghṛtaṃ bhūyaḥ pacet kṣaudraṃ kṣipeddhane |
vayombupiṣṭaiḥ saghṛtaiḥ śiro vaktraṃ ca lepayet ||
na tu tatra sirāṃ vidhyet dṛksthitā yantrapīḍanāt |
kuryurāndhyaṃ malā dadyāt sravye tvasre jalaukasaḥ ||
bhṛṣṭaṃ ghṛtaṃ kumbhayoneḥ patraiḥ pāne ca pūjitam ||
kaṇā vā kāpile pitte māsārdhaṃ paribhāvitā |
ghṛte siddhāni jīvantyāḥ pallavāni ca bhakṣayet |
paḍetān yaḥ smarennityaṃ tasya cakṣurna hīyate ||
santarpaṇaṃ snigdhahimādi yojyaṃ tathāñjanaṃ hema ghṛtena ghṛṣṭam ||
cakṣūrakṣāyāṃ sarvakālaṃ manuṣyairyatnaḥ kartavyo jīvite yāvadicchā |
vyārtho loko 'yaṃ tulyarātrindivānāṃ puṃsāmandhānāṃ vidyāmāne 'pi vitte ||
śakunāśanatā sapādapūjā ghṛtapānaṃ ca sadaiva netrarakṣā ||
karoti vedanāṃ tīvrāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ ca sthagayet punaḥ ||

atha snigdhasya viriktasya ghṛtaiḥ sambhojitasya niśi rasena prīṇitottamāṅgasyābhuktavataḥ sajjopakaraṇasya vimale 'hani sādhake ca kṛtasvastyayanasya vihitādityavidehādhipatipraṇāmasya pūrvāhṇe nivātaprakāśadeśasthasya pratyādityamāstaraṇena labdhamārdavāyāṃ bhāmau prasāritacaraṇayugmamupaviṣṭasya kṣititalagatasamatalobhayapāṇeḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sukhopaviṣṭena paricārakeṇa hastābhyāṃ niścalamavalambitaśirasaḥ kiściduttānāsyasya svāṃ nāsāmitaraccekṣaṇamīkṣamāṇasyāturasya jaṅghayorupariṣṭānnātyucchritāsananiviṣṭo bhiṣag dakṣiṇahastānulomamakṣi mukhabāṣpasvinnaṃ nimīlitamīṣadaṅguṣṭhodaravimṛditatārakatayā pariplutadoṣaṃ savyāṅguṣṭhapradeśinībhyāmunmīlya dakṣiṇamadhyamāpradeśinyaṅguṣṭhairniṣkampaṃ gṛhītayā śalākayā kṛṣṇabhāgādbhāgadvayasyāpāṅgādekabhāgasya ca saṅgame dṛṣṭerārjavaṃ nātyūrdhvamadho vā netrasahajanmani sandhau vidhyet ||
evameva dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhapradeśinyunmīlitamitareṇa kareṇaiva cāturasya dakṣiṇapārśve sthitvā ||
atha śabdavadavedanaṃ sāmbubindusruti ca samyagviddhaṃ vidyāt |
tataḥ punarāturamāśvāsya bhramayan śalākāmā dṛṣṭimadhyāt praveśayet ||
atha vyapagatadoṣasya yathāvat paśyataḥ sukhoṣṇaghṛtāplutaṃ picumīkṣaṇasyopari datvā badhnīyāt |
tato nivātamāgāramanupraveśya saṃveśya ca sopadhāne mṛduśayane śayānaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣiṇi viddhe vāmena pārśvena vāme dakṣiṇenobhayasminnuttānamanukūlābhiḥ kathābhirupācaret |
tṛtīye cāhni muktvākṣi pariṣecayederaṇḍapallavaśṛtena dugdhoṣṇena dugdhena |
bhojayeccainaṃ vyoṣāmalakayuktaṃ dravamīṣatsnehalavaṇaṃ vāṭyamuṣṇodakadvitīyaṃ vilepīṃ vā |
tadanuvṛttau tu yaṣṭīmadhukalodhramṛdvīkāsaindhavaiḥ siddhena sasitenājapayasā nayanamāścyotayet |
tatrādhovyadhādatyarthaśūlāsrasrutirāgāḥ śalākāyāṃścopalepo bahalapicchilaḥ kṛṣṇāṃ valibhirupacīyate nayanaṃ sravati tadvarjayet ||
tatra stanyamadhukavipakvena sarpiṣā pariṣeko 'pāṅge vā dāhaḥ ||
atītya dṛṣṭiṃ śalākāyāḥ preraṇādraktasravaṇaṃ raktābharūpadarśanaṃ ca |
tatra śalākayā spṛṣṭo liṅganāśo yaḥ sphuṭati tameraṇḍapatrasvinnaṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ śodhayet |
avagalati tu śalākāmapanīya stanyasekaṃ dadyādavapīḍanaṃ ca śuṇṭhīguḍaṃ jalaukasaśca |
vistīryamāṇe sukhoṣṇāmbuplutena vāsasā svedo ghṛtamaṇḍaśca pratimarśaḥ |
tadvadutplavamāne vitrāsanaṃ śītāmbhasā pratataṃ cocchiṅkhanaṃ ca ||
tathāpyanapagacchati śalākāpagamane vā punarutplavane snehapānanasyādibhirupapādya punarvidhyet |
yastvapakṛṣyamāṇo dṛṣṭimaṇḍale līyate tatra kṣīreṇa nāḍīsvedaṃ dadyāt |
kaṇṭhā ca viṣamāśrūṇi drasvā dīrghā ca durgrahā ||
ājena tāmramamunā pratanupradigdhaṃ saptāhataḥ punaridaṃ payasaiva piṣṭam ||
piṇḍāñjanaṃ hitamanātapaśuṣkamakṣṇi viddhe prasādajananaṃ balakṛcca dṛṣṭeḥ |
śuṣkālpā dūṣikā śītamalpaṃ cāśru calā rujaḥ |
anekarūpā jāyante vraṇo dṛṣṭau ca dṛṣṭihā ||
raktotpanno hanti tadvattrirātrānmithyācārāt paittikaḥ sadya eva ||
atha khalu sarvagākṣirogāṇāṃ pūrvarūpa eva śirovirekakavaladhūmopavāsānāsevetānyatra mārutodrekāt ||
śvetalodhratvacaṃ bahirvilikhitāṃ nimbapatrakalkena pradigdhāṃ puṭapāke vipakvāmardhapalonmitāṃ maricacatuṣṭayayuktāṃ ślakṣṇarajīkṛtāṃ vastrabaddhāmakṣṇyavakiret |
pūrvavadvā lodhravalkalakalkamupaskṛtaṃ tanmātrameva maricadvayena manaśśilāpādenāṣṭāṃśakaiśca yaṣṭīmadhukaśatapuṣpāñjanairyuktaṃ prakalpayet |
taccūrṇaṃ sakṛcūdavarṇanānniśīthe netrāṇāṃ vidhamati sadya eva kopam ||
evaṃ cānupaśame vātābhiṣyandinamādāveva jāṅgalarasairbhejayitvā daśamūlarāsnātriphalākvāthena jīvanīyakalkena ca payoyutaṃ siddhamitaradvā purāṇasarpiḥ pāyayet ||
punaśca snigdhāya tilvakena saṃyuktaṃ vā tilvakakaṣāyānupānaṃ sarpirvirecanaṃ dadyāt |
atha tilān nistuṣān bilvaphalakvāthena bhāvayenniśi divā śoṣayedevaṃ pañcāham |
tebhyastailaṃ gṛhītvā varāhamedoyuktaṃ bilvamūlamadhuyaṣṭikākalkena payasā ca pacet |
tataḥ snehamuddhṛtya candanośīraśarkarotpalakalkena kṣīravatā pakvaṃ tarpaṇam |
puṭapākaṃ ca chāgorabhravarāhāṇāmanyatamasya yakṛt pippalīsaindhavamadhughṛtopetaṃ kuryāt |
kṛṣṇatilān nistuṣān kṛtvā stanyena saptāhaṃ bhāvayecchoṣayecca |
taccūrṇaṃ sitopalāsamaṃ kṛtvā madhukārdhabhāgena saindhavāṃśena kṛṣṇasarpaśirasaścāntardhūmadagdhasya bhāgena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ divyodakapiṣṭāṃ guṭikāṃ kārayet ||
eṣā māsaṃ sthitā rasakriyā dṛṣṭiprasādanī rujāharā ca ||
nīlībhūtaṃ ca tadviśuṣkaṃ mastunā vartayaḥ kṛtāḥ chāyāviśoṣitā vātākṣirogaṃ jayanti |
sarpiṣānupaśame tailaṃ vasāṃ majjānaṃ pūrvoktavidhivadvyatyāsena kuryāt |
tenaiva ca saśarkarastrīstanye cchāgadugdhe vā dāharāgaghnaḥ ||
śvetalodhraṃ madhukaṃ ca samaṃ ghṛtena bharjayitvā cūrṇayet |
tataḥ poṭṭalikāvabaddhaṃ stanyena toyena vā mṛditamāśu śūladāharāgaśophānapohati |
suvarṇagairikaṃ niśāṃ devyembhāsi sthitamahaḥ śoṣayet saptāha mevameva ca suśītena madhuravargakaṣāyeṇa bhāvayedetaccūrṇāñjanaṃ dāharāgaghnam ||
parisrutaṃ ca punarādarvīlepādavatārya ca sitopalāsamāṃśaṃ madhughṛtadvipalaṃ prakṣipet |
nimbapaṭolajātipatralodhradvayamahauṣadhaiḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ kalpitairvastrabaddhaiḥ sakṣaudrairgauḍe sīdhau vā pariplutaiḥ sekaḥ paraṃ śleṣmaśūladhraḥ ||
tathāpi śophagharṣānubandhe yavamadanabhūrjaśamīpatraiḥ saghṛtairghṛtenaiva vā nāḍyākṣi dhūpayet |
laghvaśitaṃ ca dvitīyehni prātarvyoṣavipakvaṃ yavakṣārāvacūrṇitaṃ sarpiḥ pāyayet |
saptasaptāhe ca gate vartayaḥ kāryāḥ maricaharidrābhayāñjanairvā jalapiṣṭā vartiḥ |
harītakī tutthaṃ ca samabhāgaṃ tutthādaṣṭāṃśena maricameṣā vartiḥ kumārī sarvaśleṣmākṣirogaghnī ||
viḍaṅgacūrṇo vā vāruṇyā bhāvitaḥ śaṅkho bījapūrarasena madhukaṃ triphalārasena pṛthagaikadhyaṃ vā cūrṇāñjanaṃ vā piṇḍo vā pothakībahalakaphotkleśābhiṣyandānapaharati ||
yakṛdājamagarupriyaṅgunaladadevadāruyutaṃ payasi kvāthayettasmin śīte khajamathite yannavanītaṃ tadebhirevauṣadhairvipakvam |
keśairjalārdraiḥ kāṃsyamudgharṣayet tān kāṃsyamaladigdhānantardhūmaṃ dagdhvā tat bhasma triphalākvāthe surasāsvarase kṣīre ca chāge pañcāhaṃ bhāvayet |
kṛṣṇasarpaṃ payasi kvāthayettataḥ pūtaśītamathitāt snehamupoṣitāya kṛkavākave dadyāt |
kṛṣṇasarpamukhamañjanasarpiṣoḥ pūrṇaṃ darbhaveṣṭitaṃ mṛdavaliptamadhomukhaṃ gomayenāgninādagdhvā tatoñjanamādāya patranaladanīlotpalatulyaṃ cūrṇīkṛtaṃ paraṃ dṛkprasādajananamañjanam ||
stanye vā chāgadugdhe vā sadyaḥkope tadañjanam ||
sārivāvidārībalāmadhukotpaladrākṣāṭarūṣakajīvakacandanairjāṅgalarasakṣīropetaṃ tailaṃ sādhitaṃ nāvanāt sarvordhvajatrujān gadān vātapittottarān nihanti ||
ādarśamaṇḍale ghṛtāktakeśān ghṛṣṭvāntardhūmaṃ dahet sā maṣī ghṛtapiṣṭāyasabhājanasthitākṣipākamañjanā dapaharati ||
evamapyaśāntau madhukasiddhaḥ śatāhvācūrṇayukto ghṛtamaṇḍastathā payo vā bastiḥ ||
tataḥ piṇḍasvinnaśirasaḥ sarṣapatailena saindhavayutena vā sarpiṣā phaṇijjakayuktena vā aṇutailena śiṃrovirekaḥ |
śaśaśiraḥkapālaṃ saindhavaṃ kāṃsye stanyaghṛṣṭaṃ sandhāvo vedanāghnaḥ |
śaṅkhaṃ tāmre stanyena ghṛṣṭaṃ ghṛtābhyaktayavaśamīpatradhūpitaṃ gharṣavedanāghnam ||

tālīsapatrapippalīloharrajoñjanakāsīsatagarajātīmukulasaindhavairgomūtrapiṣṭaistāmramāliptaṃ saptarātraṃ sthāpayitvā punastadvadevapiṣṭairguṭikāḥ kāryāstāḥ stanyaghṛṣṭāḥ stambhaśvayathuharṣagharṣāśrukaṇḍūghnyaḥ ||
abaddhāsthisahakāramāṃsaṃ vigatatvacaṃ samatāmracūrṇamīṣat saindhavopetaṃ gavyena dadhnā piṣṭvā tāmramālepayet |
śuṣkaṃ śuṣkaṃ tathaiva ca piṣṭvā punarlepayet |
tuvarikāphalatrikarocanākvāthena madhumatā sāyaṃ prātaḥ sadā prakṣālanamañjanānte ca kaṣāyavṛkṣapallavakaṣāyeṇa ||
tutthakapalaṃ viṃśatiśca śvetamaricāni dhānyāmla piṣṭāni tatpalaistriṃśatā tāmrapātre samāloḍitāni bahuvarṇāmapi pillānāṃ paramamāścyotanam ||
añjanaṃ cāsyāmradhātakīpuṣpatilaparṇīkalkena ca varttiḥ harītakyāḍhakīścāṣṭaguṇembhāsyaṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣaṃ kvāthayet punaśca parisrāvyādarvīpralepādrasakriyeyaṃ pillākṣiropaṇī |
paripelavakāsīsaharidrādvayasarṣapapriyaṅgutagarapippalīkalkena tāmrabhājanamantarlepayitvā sauvīrakakumbhedhomukhaṃ saptāhaṃ vāsayet tato guṭikāścūrṇaṃ vā kuryāt ||
śākaṃ caivaṃvidhaṃ māṃsaṃ jāṅgalaṃ dāḍimaṃ sitām ||
saindhavaṃ triphalāṃ drākṣāṃ vāri pāne ca nābhasam |
dve pādamadhye pṛthusanniveśe sire gate te bahudhā ca netre |
cirācca pākaḥ pakvaṃ tu lasīkāmalpaśaḥ sravet |
uccaiḥ kṛcchrācchrutiṃ kuryāt badhiratvaṃ krameṇa ca ||
votana śoṣitaḥ śleṣmā sroto limpettato bhavet |
rug gauravaṃ pidhānaṃ ca sa pratīnāhasaṃjñitaḥ ||
kapho vidagdhaḥ pittena sarujaṃ nīrujaṃ tathā |
eko nīruganeko vā garbhe māṃsāṅkuraḥ sthiraḥ |
sarvaṇaḥ sarujaḥ stabdhaḥ śvayaghuḥ sa upekṣitaḥ ||
saṅkocayati rūḍhā ca sā dhruvaṃ karṇaśaṣkulīm ||
kṛśā dṛḍhā ca tantrīvat pālī vātena tantrikā ||
vātaje karṇaśūle rātrau rātrau rasabhojanottaraṃ vātaharadravyasiddhaṃ sarpiḥ pibonniranno vā payonupānam ||
tato daśamūlasiddhe chāge payasi gośṛṅganihite 'gnivarṇān pāṣāṇān sandaṃśena gṛhītvāvapet |
ghṛtatailavasābhyaktāni taruṇānyaśvatthapatrāṇi puṭapāksvinnāni prapīḍya tadrasena karṇaṃ pūrayet ||
tato dahyamānādyaḥ snehaḥ patati sa sadyaḥ karṇarujamapaharati ||
madhūcchiṣṭakaiḍaryamadhuśigruphalavacāyavanaladailāguggulubhiḥ ślakṣṇapiṣṭaiḥ kṣaumavastraṃ dhūmavarttipramāṇapariṇāhaṃ lepayettataḥ sūtreṇāveṣṭya ḍuṇḍukanālena dhūmaṃ pātuṃ dadyāt ||
parihāryāṇi ca pariharedviśeṣataḥ pravātaṃ śītāmbupānaṃ śiraḥsnānaṃ ca ||
pittaje tu śūle prātaḥ śarkarāyutaṃ sarpiḥ pāyayet |
madhukakuḍavaṃ ṣoḍaśaguṇenāmbhasāṣṭāvaśeṣaṃ sādhayitvā tena tailārddhakuḍavamaṣṭaguṇakṣīraṃ yaṣṭīsadhukośīrasārivākākolījīvakānantāmṛṇālamañjiṣṭhālodhracandanabisagarbhaṃ pacet |
eṣāmeva ca kalkena saghṛtena karṇa parito lepayet |
kaphaje pippalīvipakvaṃ ghṛtamathavā sakṣaudraṃ pāyayitvā taṃ vāmayet |
rasāñjanamārkavavaijayantīśigrulaśunārdrakamūlakadalīnāṃ vā pṛthak samastānāṃ vā rasena madhunā vā rakṣoghnatailena vā |
upadigdhaṃ ca srotaḥ sāyaṃprātaḥ picuvartibhiḥ pramṛjya yavāgarumadanaiḥ saghṛtairguggulunā vā dhūpayitvā madhunā pūrayet ||
palāśadhavatiniśakakubhasarjatvakkvātha rasakriyayā svabhyaktāṃ picuvartiṃ srotasi dadyāt |
eṣāmeva ca kaṣāyeṇa sakṣaudreṇa kapitthasvarasena vā prakṣālanam |
bādhiryaṃ ca bālavṛddhakṣīṇakāsaśoṣiṇāṃ cirotthitaṃ ca varjayet ||
tatra prāgeva purāṇasarpiṣā vā vātaharatailena vā snigdhaṃ snehenaiva virecayet |
karṇāsannaṃ jalaukobhistato bastikarmamūrdhatailanasyadhūmān karṇapūraṇaṃ ca śīlayet ||
taruṇabilvaphalāni gomūtreṇa kvāthayettena kvāthena sitāmadhukabījakabījakalkena ca payoyuktaṃ tailaṃ pācayet |
tattailamuṣṇaṃ śīte bilvakvāthe prakṣipya manthayet yāvat piṇḍībhūtamuddhṛtya caitatpunaranyatra bilvodake manthayet |
tataścoddhṛtyāṣṭaguṇe payasi madhukagandhacandanagarbhaṃ sādhitamāśu karṇapūraṇāt bādhiryaṃ nāśayati ||
tilān navapralūnān vastrabaddhān vahantīṣvapsu rātrimuṣitān divā śoṣayet pañcarātram |
evaṃ gate pañcarātre madhuyaṣṭikākṣīrakākolīmahāpañcamūladevadāruśatāhvājīvakakvathite payasi pañcāhamevaṃ vāsayecchoṣayecca |
tatonenaiva kṣīreṇaiṣāmeva ca dravyāṇāṃ cūrṇamātrayā yuktān prapīḍayet |
etannasye karṇapūraṇe śirasi cābhyañjane praṇītamāśu śūlanādabādhiryāṇi sarvavātavikārāṃśca pittānubandhānapohati bhagnāsthisandhānajananaṃ ca ||
atha karṇau suptāviva bhavatastatsamīpe yathoktāṃ sirāṃ mokṣayet |
pratīnāhe snehasvedaklinnaṃ karṇaṃ karṇaśodhanena viśodhya tailasya pūrayenmātuluṅgarasasya vā saśuktakṣaudrasaindhavasya ||
śodhyamāne vedanā raktāgamo vā yadi bhavettato ghṛtamaṇḍena pūrayennasyaṃ ca śīlayet |
karṇavidradhiṃ vamanapūrvaṃ vidradhivadāmaṃ pakvaṃ ca cikitset |

godhāpratudaviṣkirānūpaudakamāṃsavasāmajjānaṃ sarpissarṣapatailaṃ ca yathālābhaṃ saṅgṛhyārkālarkabalātibalānantāvidārigandhājalaśūkamadhuravargapratīvāpaṃ vipacedayamabhyaṅgaḥ pālyāḥ paraṃ māṃsajananaḥ ||
evamapi tu yā kṣīyate pālī tasyā yadduṣṭaṃ tacchitvā vidhivat sandhāya yathoktena krameṇopacaret ||
ebhireva ca sarvaissamaricanimbapatramadhūcchiṣṭaissarṣapatailaṃ siddhaṃ lehikāvraṇaghno 'bhyaṅgaḥ paridahane jalajābhirasṛk srāvayet |
grathitāyāṃ granthiṃ pāṭayitvā vilikhya ca kṛṣṇāsaindhavamadhubhiḥ pratisārayet |
samāsatastu pañcadaśa karṇasandhayaḥ prāyo nāmānugatasaṃsthānasthānaviśeṣatayā sambhavanti ||
yā tvekaiva pālī sthūlā pṛthvī sthirā ca syāt tāṃ dvidhā pāṭayitvopari chitvā sandadhyāt ||
gaṇḍotkṛttena vā saśoṇitena sānubandhena māṃsena pālīṃ kalpayet |
yasya pālīdvayamapi nāsti tasyāpyeṣa eva vidhiḥ |
athavā samānavayodoṣādeḥ sañcārya karṇapīṭhaṃ samaṃ madhya niveśya varddhayet ||
sandhānavidhiḥ punarāture grathitakeśānte bandhanamupaghārite chedyabhedyalekhyairupapannairupapādya karṇaṃ śoṇitamavekṣeta duṣṭamaduṣṭaṃ veti ||

tato vātaduṣṭe dhānyāmloṣṇodakābhyāṃ pittaduṣṭe kṣīraśītodakābhyāṃ śleṣmaduṣṭe vāruṇīsalilābhyāṃ prakṣālya punaścāvalikhyānunnatamahīnaviṣamaṃ sandhiṃ niveśya tato madhughṛtābhyāmabhyajya picuplotayoranyatareṇāvaguṇṭhya sūtreṇa nātigāḍhamaśithilaṃ ca badhvā sirāvyathoktena kapālasya vā cūrṇenāvakīryācārikamupadiśet ||
tryahāccaturahādvā salilena pariṣicya picuṃ sūtraṃ cāpanayet |
na cāśuddharaktamatipravṛttaraktaṃ kṣīṇaraktaṃ vā karṇaṃ sandadhyāt ||
tasya hi svayamapi sandhirviśliṣyate ādhmāyate śyāvatāmupaiti pacyate śuṣyati cirādrohati rūḍhopyābharaṇaṃ na kṣamate |
sarvatra caivamapi sopadravasandhau sandhiṃ vimucya pūrvāpacāropasthāpitasmṛtiḥ samyaksandadhīteti |
sīvyet gaṇḍaṃ tataḥ sūcyā sīvanyā picuyuktayā ||
kruddhā vātolbaṇā doṣā nāsāyāṃ styānatāṃ gatāḥ |
tatra vātāt pratiśyāye mukhaśoṣo bhṛśaṃ kṣavaḥ |
kīṭakā iva sarpanti manyate parito bhruvau |
śleṣmā sucikkaṇaḥ pīto jñānaṃ ca rasagandhayoḥ ||
ajasraṃ picchilaṃ śītaṃ pakvaṃ siṅghāṇakaṃ ghanam ||
kaphaṃ sa śuṣkaḥ puṭatāṃ prāpnoti puṭakaṃ tu tat ||
ghṛtāktasaktūn mallakasampuṭe kṛtvā dhūmaṃ ca pibet ||
atha vātapratiśyāye pūrvameva vātaharadravyavipakvaṃ sasaindhavaṃ prātaḥ sarpiḥ pibenmahāṣaṭpalaṃ vā ||
daśamūlakulatthakolayavaśuṣkamūlakavyoṣalavaṇapañcakaiḥ sadadhi dhānyāmlaṃ sarpiḥ siddhamāhāre pāne ca praṇītaṃ pratiśyāyayakṣmākāsaśvāsagrahaṇīgulmavibandhaghnam ||
jīrṇasnehaṃ jāṅgalarasena vyoṣadāḍimasaindhavavatā bālamūlakarasena sarvadhānyayūṣeṇa vā bhojayet |
evamaparipacyamāne punaḥ punarnāḍīsvedaṃ vātaharaṃ cāsthāpanamanuvāsanaṃ śirobastiṃ ca ||
pakve tu tailaṃ kṣavakacūrṇayuktaṃ sasaindhavaṃ sarpirvā śirovirecanam ||

pittapratiśyāye padmakośīrapaṭolasārivāvidārīśatāvarīkṣīridrumaśuṅgaśaṭhīkarkaṭākhyādurālabhānāmarddhaḍhakamaṣṭaguṇembhāsi vipācya pādāvaśeṣe madhukamṛdvīkācandanaśṛṅgāṭakakaśerukaśvetapākānyakṣamātrāṇi datvā ghṛtaprasthaṃ payasā saha sādhayet |
tatra ca pakve doṣe śirovirekaṃ purāṇaghṛtena sasaindhavena ghṛtamaṇḍena vā kaṭphalānvitena kuryāt |
viśuddhasrotasaśca jāṅgalarasena kṣīreṇa vā śītena bhojanam ||
tato vāmanīyauṣadhakvāthasiddhayā sasarpiṣkayā saindhavamāṣacūrṇapragāḍhayā peyayoṣṇāmbhasā ca vāmayet ||
tailāpluto nāgaracūrṇānuviddho mudga āhāro yathāsātmyaṃ ca rūkṣatīkṣṇoṣṇam ||
bhṛśakṣavathau puṭake ca nimbakaṭphalakuṣṭhamaricacūrṇaiḥ kledanāya pradhamanam |
vamitavato nirguṇḍīśigrutarkārīphaṇijjakakṣavakasurasārjakapatrasvarasena sārṣapaṃ pīlujaṃ vā tailaṃ vipācya nasyaṃ vidadhyāt ||
sthūlāni tu śastreṇa spṛṣṭvā dāhānantaraṃ śītāṃ kriyāṃ yojayet ||
arbudaṃ baḍiśena gṛhītvā maṇḍalāgreṇa mūle samaṃ chindyāt |
calapramṛṣṭaṃ ca vraṇaṃ śalākayā dahettailena vā |
uparūḍhavraṇasya lodhrāvāpaṃ tīkṣṇoṣṇalavaṇadravyagomūtrayuktaṃ sārṣapaṃ kārañjaṃ vā tailaṃ nāvanam |
gandhājñānaṃ ca vīsarpo mūrcchā chindyādataḥ samam ||
grathitau ca punaḥ syātāṃ kaṇḍūlau daśanacchadau ||
dālyanta iva śūlena śītākhyo dālanaśca saḥ ||
pūtitvāt kṛmayaḥ sūkṣmā jāyante jāyate tataḥ |
calā mandarujo dantāḥ pūtivaktraṃ ca jāyate ||
tāḥ punaḥ pañca vijñeyā lakṣaṇaiḥ svairyathoditaiḥ ||
kṛṣṇāruṇo vā todāḍhyaḥ sa vātāt kṛṣṇarājimān |
sthiraḥ savarṇaḥ kaṇḍūmān śītasparśo guruḥ kaphāt |
dehaṃ vṛddhasya kurute gale śabdaṃ svare 'lpatā ||
tāmyan prasaktaṃ śvasiti yena sa svarahānilāt ||
vivṛṇoti ca kṛcchreṇa mukhaṃ pāko mukhasya saḥ ||
kuryāttat ghaṭṭitaṃ chinnaṃ mṛditaṃ ca vivardhate ||
auṣṭhe gaṇḍe dvije mūle jihvāyāṃ tāluke gale |
ekādaśaiko daśa ca trayodaśa tathā ca ṣaṭ |
snigdhasvinnasya khaṇḍauṣṭhasyauṣṭhāntau vilikhya suśliṣṭau kṣaumasūtreṇa sīvyet |
kaphaje jalaukobhiḥ śākādipatrairvā raktaṃ visrāvya vyoṣapāṭhāyavakṣārasvarjikākṣāraiḥ sakṣaudraiḥ pratisārayet |
medoje dantacchadaṃ svedayitvā vṛddhipatreṇa vipāṭya śuddhamedasamagninānupacaret |
avagāḍhamativṛddhaṃ vā kṣāreṇāgninā vā dahet haridrālodhramadhukamālatīhareṇutagarairvipakvaṃ tailaṃ ropaṇam ||
gaṇḍālajīmapakvāṃ śophavadvidagdhāmupanāhya pakvāṃ vidārya vraṇavat sādhayet ||
śītadantasyoṣṇāmubusvinnasya vrīhimukhena pālīṃ likhitvā picutailena dahet |
dantaharṣe bhede ca vātaharasiddhaṃ tailamelākuṣṭhapāṭalīsvagvipakvo majjā vā gaṇḍūṣaḥ |
niyataṃ ca snaihikadhūmapāyī snigdhamadhurāhāro visrāvaṇaparaḥ syāt |
candanapadmakamadhukavidārīkaśerukanīlotpalamṛdvīkājīvakarṣabhakaśarkarāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ palena kṣīreṇa ca māṃsarasadviguṇena tailaprasthaṃ vipācayet |
adhidantakaṃ kṣāreṇālipya jarjaraṃ vijñāya kṛmidantakavidhinotpāḍya tadvadevopacaret |
kṛmidantake suṣiraṃ guḍena madhūcchiṣṭena sarpiṣa vāpūrayitvā taptayā kubjaśalākayā dahet |
evamanupaśame sandaṃśayantreṇa dantamāyataṃ gṛhītvā vicālya śasreṇa pārśvebhyo mokṣayitvoddharet |
prakṣālitamukhaśca samadhukacūrṇaṃ tailaṃ madhu vā gaṇḍūṣaṃ dhārayet ||
madhuravargasiddhameva vā sarpiḥ punaḥ punaśca rudhirāvasekaḥ ||
vivṛddhantu baḍiśena macuṭyā vā gṛhītvā maṇḍalāgreṇa chitvā tīkṣṇaiḥ pratisārayet |
vidarbhe dantamūlāni śastreṇa viśodhya kṣāraṃ prayujya ghṛtamaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍūṣe dadyāt |
dantanāḍīmeṣayitvā saṃvṛtāṃ śastreṇa vivṛtayitvā tadāśritaṃ dantamaśeṣamuddhṛtya śalākayā dahet |
upajihvāṃ śākapatreṇāṅguliśastreṇa vā visrāvya yavakṣāreṇa pratisārayet ||
vṛddhāyāṃ tūrvārubījanibhamasirātatamagramuparijivhāyāniviṣṭaṃ baḍiśena mucuṭyā vā vastraveṣṭitābhyāṃ vāmāṅguṣṭhapradeśinībhyāṃ gṛhītvā maṇḍalāgreṇa nātyagre nātimūle chindyāt |
tālusaṅghāte puppuṭe kacchape ca nave vidhirayam |
tāluśoṣe madhukapippalīnāgarasiddhaṃ sarpiruttaraṃ bhaktikaṃ satṛṣṇaḥ pibet |
kaṇṭharogeṣu tu jvarādyanupadruteṣu kaṭunīkṣṇairnasyāvagharṣaṇagaṇḍūṣādayaḥ sirāvyadho rasāñjanendrayavadārvīnimbakvāthaḥ pānam |
atha vātarohiṇīkāmantarbahiḥ svinnāmaṅguliśastrakeṇa madhulavaṇagarbheṇa vā nakhena visrāvya tīkṣṇaiḥ pratisārayet |
pūrvoktāḥ pralepāḥ prātaḥ prātaścāsanādisārarajo gomūtreṇa pibet |
evamapyaśāntau śastreṇa vidārya medo viśodhya sīvyet |
mukhapākeṣu sāmānyatastriphalākvātho madhumānanye ca tiktakaṭukakaṣāyā mukhadhāvanāḥ |
dāruharidrārdhatulāṃ viṃśatiguṇe 'mbhasi śrapayitvā taṃ kvāthaṃ sagairikamādarvīpralepāt sādhitaṃ kṣaudrayuktaṃ ghṛtabhājane nidadhyāt |
yavakṣārabhāgāḥ sapta suvarṇagairikāt bhāgadvayaṃ mūrvākaṭukātiviṣāmalakānāmeko bhāgastat sarvaṃ kutalakṣārodakapiṣṭaṃ guṭikāḥ kṛtvā khādenniṣṭhīvecca ||
khadirasāratulāmarimedatulādvayaṃ ca toyavahe 'ṣṭabhāgāvaśeṣaṃ kvāthayedavatāritaṃ parisrutaṃ ca punarāghanībhāvāt |
tā guṭikā vadanasthāḥ sarvān mukharogān jayanti |
eṣāmeva ca kalkakaṣāyaistailaṃ sādhitaṃ kavale niyuñjyāt ||
tatra vātaje mukhapāke daśamūlakākolīrāsnāmadhukasārivākvāthena kuṣṭhakalkena ca siddhaṃ tailaṃ nasyaṃ gaṇḍūṣaśca |
madhuradravyasiddhaṃ payaḥ pānaṃ kavalo nasyaṃ ca |
devadārupāṭhātiviṣādantīndrayavakaṭukāgomūtreṇa kalkatāḥ kvathitā vā pītāḥ sarvakaphāmayān nighnanti ||
rocanākāsīsasaurāṣṭrikārasāñjanāni mocaraso madhu caikato vipakvaṃ lohabhājanasthaṃ kalkaṃ viśuṣkaṃ curṇīkṛtaṃ madhunā vraṇalepaṃ kuryāt ||
atha sarvasaramarbudamacirotthitamavṛddhaṃ maṇḍalāgreṇa chitvā muṣkakabhasmanā madhumiśreṇa pratisārayet svarjikāśuṇṭhīcūrṇena vā |
prāyaḥ śastaṃ teṣāṃ kapharaktaharaṃ tathā karma ||
nistudyete bhṛśaṃ śaṅkhau ghāṭā sambhidyate tathā |
ghūrṇatīva śiraḥ sarvaṃ sandhibhya iva mucyate ||
kopite sannipāte ca jāyante mūrdhni jantavaḥ ||
śirasyeva ca vakṣyante kapāle vyādhayo nava ||
khalaterapi janmaivaṃ śātanaṃ tatra tu kramāt ||
dagdhāgnineva nirlomā sadāhā yā ca jāyate ||
tadvātāt sphuṭitaṃ śyāvaṃ kharaṃ rūkṣaṃ jvalatprabham |
nivātasthaṃ ca naktamabhyaktaśirasaṃ sarpiḥ payonupānaṃ tailaṃ vā pāyayet |
tataḥ pratyūṣe daśamūlasiddhena payasā kavoṣṇena pariṣekaṃ kuryāt |
kūrmamahiṣavarāhakukkuṭaśallakīnāṃ vasā sasaindhavā nasyaṃ śiraḥkarṇapūraṇaṃ ca |
tathaiva ca pañcamūlabalāsārivādvayakvāthe madhukajīvakarṣabhakapunarnavagarbhaṃ sapayaḥ sarpistailaṃ caikato vipakvam ||
evamasiddhau vātaje śleṣmaje ca yathokto dāhaḥ ||
pittaje raktaje ca śirobhitāpe snigdhasya sirāṃ vidhyet |
suśītaiḥ śatadhautaghṛtānvitaiḥ śiro vaktraṃ siñcet pradihyācca ||
jīvanīyavipakvāt payaso navanītamuddhṛtya jīvanīyakvāthakalkābhyāṃ pācitaṃ pānabhojananasyābhyaṅgabastiṣu praṇītaṃ pittaraktajān sarvānvikārān sādhayati |
viḍaṅgatailaṃ nasyaṃ sārṣapaṃ vā tadeva vā vyoṣasiddham madhūkasārakalko vā madhuyutastvagvā meṣaśṛṅgyā iṅgudasya vā |
taireva ca pakvaṃ tailaṃ marśaḥ pratimarśo vā ||
upasnigdhasvinnasya devadārupūtīkakaṭabhīsarṣapaviḍaṅgatilakaṇṭakavipakvena tailena śiraḥ karṇau cābhyajya svedayet ||
tato rudhiragandhamadena prāvisṛtāḥ saptacchadasya tvagrasena puṣparasena vānantaraniṣiktena kṛmayaḥ patanti ||
gomāṃsena chāgamāṃsena vā vasāpiṣṭena yavāgūṃ kṛtvā śiro vilepayet |

evaṃ kṛmiṣvapagateṣu tejovatīpūtīkabimbīsurasanaktamālaviḍaṅgaharītakīsarṣapārkakaravīramūlamālatīdevadārukṣavakamustaphaṇijjakapippalīśatapuṣpāmadhūkaśaṇanimbasārakalkairajāmūtrayutaiḥ sārṣapaṃ tailamaiṅgudaṃ pailukaṃ vā vipakvaṃ yuktyā nāvanam ||
jantubhiḥ pītaśoṇite hi śirasi punarasrāvasekādakāṇḍe mṛtyuḥ syāt |
upaśīrṣake janmottarakālajāte navotthite vātavyādhivihitān snehān pānanāvanābhyañjaneṣu yojayet |
abhyaktaṃ ca svedayitvopanāhayedyathā vidāho na bhavati |
rūḍhaṃ tu vidradhau yadi tvak supteva bhavati tato vāmayet |
arūṃṣikāsu jalaukopahṛtaśoṇitaṃ śiraḥ kṣurāmṛṣṭaṃ vā nimbodakena pariṣicyāśvaśakṛdrasena lavaṇapragāḍhena lepayet |
avagāḍhapadaṃ vā sūcīkūrcakena pracchāya bhūyobhūyaḥ pradihyāt kapotapaṅkāmūlena lāṅgīlakāmūlena vā mahiṣīkṣīrapiṣṭena ||

triphalārjunasairyakatvakpuṣpakṛṣṇapiṇḍītakaphalamūlanīlotpalalohacūrṇakāsīsajamvūmārkavamañjiṣṭhāmeṣaśṛṅgīkhadirarajaḥ sakardamamarditoktāṇutailayuktamasana sārasamudgake nyastaṃ kardame māsaṃ nikhātaṃ sthitamuddhṛtaṃ sūcīkūrcapracchitāyāḥ khalaterlepaḥ paraṃ romasañjananaḥ ||

jambūdvayatvakpatramadhukabhṛṅgarajāstriphalāśleṣmātakamañjiṣṭhāphaṇijjakabalādrākṣājaśṛṅgīcapalātiviṣākaṭphalakalkena kṣīrivṛkṣakkāthena ca tilatailamakṣatailaṃ caikadhyaṃ sādhayet tannasye 'bhyaṅge ca niyuñjyāt |
asanapuṣpapatramaye pātre bahirāmalakīkalkapradigdhe nihitamakṣatailaṃ ṣaṇmāsaṃ vrīhipalle sthitamabhyaṅgānnāvanācca palitaṃ jayati |
kapikacchūphalamūlagarbhamakṣatailaṃ siddhamayaḥpātre pūrvavat sthitaṃ samānaṃ pūrveṇa ||

rāmataraṇīmūlapaladvayaṃ yaṣṭīmadhukapalaṃ sārivārdhapalamekatrajarjarīkṛtamakṣatailapalairdaśabhirāplutaṃ lohabhājane daśāhaṃ divasakarakaraprataptaṃ nāvanāt palitaghnaṃ sarvendriyadārḍhyāvahaṃ ca ||
tataḥ pūrvoktarasadrutena padminīkardamapraliptaptadhautān keśān kapālaṃ ca lepayet |
khalatau palite valyāṃ harillomni ca śodhitam |
siddhaśśailāsane bhāṇḍe śṛṅge meṣasya vā sthitaḥ |
ebhireva ca bhaiṣajyaiḥ śiro vaktraṃ ca lepayet ||
tattailaṃ keśakārṣṇyaṃ janayati paramaṃ nāvanābhyañjanābhyāṃ mūrddhaghrāṇākṣidantaśravaṇagalarujaṃ hanti niśśeṣataśca ||
jale paktvā ghṛtaprasthaṃ tasmin kṣīrasamaṃ pacet |
sarvendriyāṇi yenāsmin prāṇā yena ca saṃśritāḥ |

tatra śyāvo 'ruṇaḥ kṛṣṇo bhasmāsthikapotagalānyatamavarṇo vā dadhimastukṣārāmbumāṃsadhāvanapulākodakanibhālpasrāvo rūkṣaścaṭacaṭāyamānaśīlo 'kasmādvividhaśūlasphuraṇāyāmatodabhedasvāpabahulo nirmāṃsaśca vātāt ||

snigdhaḥ sthūlauṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍuścaṇḍakaṇḍūrnavanītavasāmajjapiṣṭatilanārikelāmbusadṛśaśvetaśītabahalapicchilakledaḥ svāpastambhastaimityagauravopadehayuktaḥ sirāsnāyujālāvatato mandavedanaḥ kaṭhinaśca kaphāt ||
yathāsvaliṅgasaṅkare dvābhyāṃ tribhiḥ sarvaiśca duṣṭaṃ vidyāt |
tatra yathoktaduṣṭaliṅgābhāvāt saṃrambharahitatvaṃ jihvāvarṇatā ślakṣṇatvaṃ nīrujatvaṃ nirāsrāvatā śyāvaparyantatvaṃ samauṣṭhamadhyatā kiñcidunnatamadhyatā vā ||
tatra ghṛṣṭāsu vā tvakṣu sphoṭeṣu vā bhinneṣu salilaprakāśo bhavatyāsrāvaḥ |
sandhigataḥ samantāt prapīḍyamāno na pravartate tathākuñcanaprasāraṇonnamananamanapravāhaṇeṣu sravati picchilo 'valambī sa phenarudhironmiśraśca ||
asthi tvabhihataṃ sphuṭitaṃ bhinnaṃ doṣāvadāritaṃ vā doṣabhakṣitatvānnissāraṃ bhavati |
svayaṃ vidīrṇāśca doṣajā na tu vaidyakṛtāḥ ||
vayasthānāṃ dṛḍhānāṃ prāṇavatāṃ satvavatāmātmavatāṃ dīptāgnīnāṃ ca vraṇāḥ sucikitsyāḥ ||
eta eva guṇā vṛddhakṛśālpaprāṇabhīrumandāgniprakledidehadeśakāleṣu viparītāḥ śiṣyopanayanīyaṃ cekṣeta ||
vraṇāḥ kṛcchreṇa sidhyanti yeṣāṃ ca syurvraṇe vraṇāḥ ||

asādhyāḥ punarmāṃsapiṇḍavadudgatāḥ prasekinontaḥpūyā vedanāvantaśca pāyuvadudvṛttauṣṭhāḥ kaṭhinā gośṛṅgavadunnatamāṃsaprarohā duṣṭaśoṇitāsrāviṇastanupicchilāsrāvasrāviṇo vā madhyonnatāḥ samavasannasuṣiraparyantāḥ śaṇatūlavatsnāyujālavanto durdarśanā medomajjavasāmastuluṅgasrāviṇaśca doṣasamutthāḥ pītāsitāmūtrapurīṣavātavāhinaśca koṣṭhasthāḥ raktaśayajāśca kṣārodakasamāsrāvāḥ pakvāśayajāśca pulākodakamiva sravantaḥ kṣīṇamāṃsānāṃ ca sarvatogatayastvaṇumukhamāṃsabudbudavantaḥ saśabdavātavāhinaśca śiraḥkaṭhasthā visarpajvarapipāsārocakāvipākakāsaśvāsātīsāracchardiyuktāḥ bhinno ca śiraḥkapāle yatra mastuluṅgadarśanaṃ tridoṣaliṅgaprādubhāvo vā syāditi |
vraṇasya śophāvasthāyāṃ śastrakarmavidhau śvayathucikitsite ca sādhanamuddiṣṭam |
sadyaḥ śāmyanti śuddhānāṃ vraṇāḥ śophāśca dehinām ||
yastu śītastanurmuhurmuhuśca prayujyate sa pradeho raktapittatvacāṃ prasādakṛt |
pralepastūṣṇaḥ śīto vā bahalaśca tathā vātaśleṣmapraśamanastasyopayogaḥ kṣatākṣateṣu |
yastu kṣateṣūpayujyate sa bhūyaḥ kalka iti saṃjñāṃ labhate ||
snaihiko nirvāpaṇaḥ prasādanaḥ stambhano vilāyanaḥ pācanaḥ pīḍanaḥ śodhano ropaṇaḥ savarṇīkaraṇaśca ||
tatra vāte snigdhadravyaiḥ snehāḍhyaiḥ snehenaiva vā snaihikaḥ |
pitte pittaprāye ca śophe viṣāgnikṣāradagdhe ca śītairnirvāpaṇaḥ |
śleṣmamedobhūyiṣṭhe śītaiścāvidagdhe piṣṭalabdhe grathite vā rūkṣairvilāyanaḥ |
na ca paryuṣitaṃ lepaṃ dadyāt bhūyastameva vā |
śophe vraṇe ca kaṭhine vivarṇe vedanānvite |
sadāhaśūlāṃstu tilānatasīśca bhṛṣṭvā payasi nirvāpya tenaiva kṣīreṇa piṣṭvā pralepayet ||
daśamūlasiddhena sukhoṣṇenāmbhasā payasā vā ghṛtatailābhyāṃ vā pariṣekaḥ śophe vraṇe vā dāhaśūlaghnaḥ ||
abhyajya svedayitvā ca veṇunāḍyā tataḥ śanaiḥ |
śigruśaṇaphalacitrakakiṇvaniṣpāvasarṣapatilātasīsaktukolagṛhadhūmairamlapiṣṭaiḥ sukhoṣṇaiḥ snigdhaiḥ salavaṇairutkārikāṃ kṛtvā tathā pralipyairaṇḍapatreṇāvacchādyabadhnīyāt ||
pākābhimukhe ca śophe yatheṣṭamāturaṃ bhojayet pācanārthaṃ pākavedanāśastrakarmasahanārthaṃ ca ||
tatra gambhīreṣu pittātmakeṣu dāhapākavatsu vraṇeṣvatīkṣṇoṣṇairebhiḥ kārpāsīphalamiśraṃ kalkaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca sādhayitvā yojayet ||
utsannamāṃseṣvalpasrāveṣu rūkṣeṣu tilāpāmārgabṛhatīdvayayuktaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ pūtīkādibhiḥ sarṣapaṃ tailaṃ ca ||
pracalapradeśajeṣu kledabahuleṣūtsannasthiramāṃseṣu tailena cāsidhyatsu rasakriyāṃ kuryāt |
yathoktānāṃ saṃśodhanauṣadhānāṃ kaṣāye punaḥ parisrāvyādhiśṛte manaśśilātuvarīkāsīsacūrṇapratīvāpasiddhāṃ ca mātuluṅgarasopetāṃ sakṣaudrāṃ yuñjīta ||
saruje kaṭhine stabdhe rūkṣe śuṣyati ca vraṇe ||
chinnāśca sandhayo yeṣāṃ yathoktairye ca sādhanaiḥ |
te vraṇe vātike yojyāḥ kaṣāyādiṣu sapptasu ||
ghanaḥ koṣṇaśca paitte tu payaḥpiṣṭo ghṛtānvitaḥ ||
rūkṣastailena vā snigdho bahalaḥ kaphaje hitaḥ ||
pūrvābhyāṃ sarpiṣā cāsau yuktaḥ syādāśu ropaṇaḥ |
sādhitaṃ tailamājyaṃ vā tadvat kampillakena vā |
kalkairebhirghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ tailaṃ vā ropaṇaṃ param ||
pralepaḥ kurute kārṣṇyaṃ sadya eva navatvaci ||
kāsīsaṃ madhukaṃ lepo vraṇe kṛṣṇe madhudrutaḥ ||
kāsīsaṃ prapunāṭañca māsaṃ nyastaṃ tato bhuvi |
vividhābhighātajanitaistu subahvākṛtibhirapi sadyovraṇairadhiṣṭhitamaṅgaṃ samāsāt trividhaṃ bhavati chinnaṃ viddhaṃ piccitaṃ ca |
etadeva caturvidhaṃ koṣṭhe pṛthumukhairvā praharaṇaiḥ kuntādibhirviddhamanubhinnaṃ bhinnottuṇḍitamatibhinnaṃ nirbhinnamiti ca saṃjñāṃ labhate ||
yat punaḥ prahāreṇa pīḍanena vā gātramasthiyuktamasṛṅmajjaplutaṃ pṛthutāmāpadyate tat piccitam |
prāyaḥ sāmānyakarmedaṃ vakṣyate tu pṛthak pṛthak ||
ghṛṣṭe rujaṃ nigṛhyāśu varṇe cūrṇāni nikṣipet |
asādhyaṃ sphuṭitaṃ netramudīrṇaṃ lambate tu yat |
tato 'sya secane nasye tarpaṇe ca hitaṃ haviḥ ||
samaṃ niveśya badhnīyāt syūtva śīghraṃ nirantaram ||
pādau vilambimuṣkasya prokṣya netre ca vāriṇā |
snehasekaṃ na kurvīta tena klidyati hi vraṇaḥ ||
chinnāṃ niśśeṣataḥ śākhāṃ dagdhvā teilena yuktitaḥ |
kāryaḥ śalyāhṛte viddhe kramo bhaṅgāttu piccite ||
kliṣṭāntraḥ saṃśaye dehī chinnāntro naiva jīvati ||
prakṣālya payasā digdhaṃ tṛṇa śoṇita pāṃsubhiḥ |
dṛḍhaṃ ca badhvā sūtreṇa varddhayet kuśalo bhiṣak |
sakṣaudre ca vraṇe baddhe sujīrṇenne ghṛtaṃ pibet |
haridre padmabījāni sośīraṃ madhukaṃ ca taiḥ |
tatra sandhimuktaṃ ṣaḍvidhamutpiṣṭaṃ viśliṣṭamavakṣiptamatikṣiptaṃ tiryakkṣiptaṃ vivartitamiti ||
tasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ prasāraṇākuñcana vivartanākṣepaṇāśaktirugrarujatā sparśāsahiṣṇutvaṃ ca ||
athotpiṣṭe svasthāna eva sandhāvubhayataḥ śopho vedanā viśeṣataśca rātrau bhavati |
tiryak kṣiptetvekasyāsthnaḥ pārśvato gamanamatyarthaṃ vedanā ca |
karkaṭakaṃ vakraṃ sthuṭitaṃ vellitamasthicchallikāśvakarṇaṃ piccitaṃ dāritaṃ cūrṇitamatipātitaṃ śeṣitaṃ majjānugatamiti ||
śvayathubāhulyaṃ spandanaṃ vivartanaṃ sparśāsahiṣṇutā ca pīḍyamāne śabdaḥ srastāṅgatā vedanātipravṛttiḥ sarvāsu cāvasthāsu śarma na labhata iti sādhāraṇamasandhibhagnarūpam ||
vaiśeṣikaṃ tu saṃvyūḍhamubhayatosthimadhyabhagnaṃ granthirivonnataṃ karkaṭakānukāri karkaṭakam ||
eṣāmantyāni pañca kṛcchrasādhyāni kṛśātibālavṛddhāsahānāmatyāśināṃ vātātmakānāṃ kuṣṭhināmupadravavatāṃ ca ||
asādhyaṃ tu bhinnaṃ kaṭīkapālaṃ sandhimuktaṃ vā jaghanamutpiṣṭaṃ kūrparo vivartitastathā lalāṭaṃ cūrṇitamasaṃśliṣṭakapālaṃ ca śiraḥ śaṃkhapṛṣṭhastanāntarabhaṅgaṃ ceti |
śithilena hi hi bandhena sandhisthairyaṃ na jāyate |
prātaḥ prātaḥ pibet bhagnaḥ śītalaṃ lākṣayāyutam ||
māsaiḥ sthairyaṃ bhavet sandheryathoktaṃ bhajatāṃ vidhim ||
maṇibandhe ca jānau ca gulphe caiṣaḥ kriyākramaḥ ||
ubhe tale same kṛtvā talabhagnasya dohinaḥ |
ghṛtaṃ vātaghnamadhuraiḥ siddhaṃ nasyaṃ ca pūjitam ||
nāsāṃ vivṛttāṃ sannaṃ vā ṛjūkṛtya śalākayā |
bhagnaṃ karṇaṃ ghṛtābhyaktaṃ nyasya bandhena yojayet |
yantraṇārthaṃ tataḥ kīlāḥ pañca kāryā nibandhanāḥ |
jaṅgo rupārśvayordvau dvau tala ekaśca kīlakaḥ ||
bhaṅgo naiti yathā pākaṃ prayateta tathā bhiṣak |
vyāyāmaṃ ca na seveta bhagno rūkṣaṃ ca bheṣajam ||
avedanaṃ ca ceṣṭāyāṃ bhagnaṃ vidyāt susādhitam ||
kṛṣṇāstilānvirajaso dṛḍhavastrabaddhān saptakṣapā bahati vāriṇi vāsayet |
saṃśoṣayedanudinaṃ pratisārya cainān kṣīre tathaiva madhukakvathite ca toye ||
vātaṃ mūtraṃ śakṛcchukraṃ khaiḥ sūkṣmairvahati kramāt ||
vraṇatāṃ yānti tāḥ pakvāḥ pramādāt tatra vātajā |
pravāhiṇīṃ balīṃ prāptaṃ sevanīṃ vā samāśritam ||
pakvapiṭakaṃ punarupasnigdhamarkādikvāthaśuddhaṃ svabhyaktamavagāhasvinnaṃ bhuktavantaṃ śayanasthamarśasamiva yantrayitvā parācīnamarvācīnaṃ bahirmukhamantarmukhaṃ vā bhagandaraṃ samyagīkṣeta ||
tato 'ntarmukhe yantraṃ prāṇidhāya pravāhaṇapraviṣṭaṃ bhagandaramabhisamīkṣya samyageṣitvā śastreṇa pāṭayet |
bahirmukhetveṣāṇīṃ praṇidhāya sāśayamuddharecchastreṇānantaraṃ co 'bhayamapyagninā kṣāreṇa copatrameta uṣṭhagrīvaṃ tu kṣāreṇaiva ||
tatra snehābhyaktagudasya snigdhān piṇḍanāḍīkumbhīsvedān prayuñjītāvagāhaṃ vā |
svinnaṃ ca vaca hiṃgukuṣṭhavyoṣalavaṇapañcakājamodān sarpirmadyākāñjikakulatthayūṣānyatamena pāyayet |
evameva ca parikṣepiṇyāmapi kramāt gatiṃ nāḍīvihitena kṣārasūtreṇa dviśastriśovāvadārayet |
arśobhagandare pūrvamarśāṃsi cchindyāt tato gatyanusāreṇa bhagandaram ||
ārdrakasya rase siddhaṃ kalke vā pāyayet ghṛtam |
guggulupañcapalaṃ palikāṃśā māgadhikā triphalā ca pṛthak syāt |
bhagandareṣveṣa viśeṣa uktaḥ śeṣāṇi tu vyañjanasādhanāni |
sāhasāni vividhāni ca ruḍhe vatsaraṃ pariharedadhikaṃ vā ||
vṛttonnataṃ yaṃ śvayathuṃ sa granthirgrathanāt smṛtaḥ ||
pittāt sadāhapītābho rakto vā pacyate drutam |
śītaḥ savarṇaḥ kaṇḍūmān pakvaḥ pūyaṃ sravet ghanam ||
pravṛddhaṃ sedurairmedo nītaṃ māṃse 'tha vā tvaci |
vāyunā kurute granthiṃ bhṛśaṃ snigdhaṃ mṛduṃ calam ||
vāyuḥ sampīḍya saṅkocya vakrīkṛtya viśoṣya ca |
nisphuraṃ nīrujaṃ granthiṃ kurute sa sirāhvayaḥ ||
tallakṣaṇaṃ ca medontaiḥ ṣoḍhā doṣādibhistu tat |
śanaiḥ śanairghanaṃ śophaṃ ślīpadaṃ taṃ pracakṣate ||
rūkṣaṃ ca vātāt pittāttu pītaṃ dāhajvarānvitam ||
ślīpadaṃ jāyate tacca deśe 'nūpe bhṛśaṃ bhramāt ||
antaḥsthitaṃ śalyamanāhṛtaṃ tu karoti nāḍīṃ vahate ca sāsya |
phenānuviddhaṃ tanumalpamuṣṇaṃ sāsra ca pūyaṃ sarujaṃ ca nityam ||
sarveṣveva pūrvaṃ granthiṣu bṛhatīdvayapippalīcitrakasādhitena purāṇasapiṃṣā snigdhaṃ vāmayet |
kṛtasaṃsarjanasyacottamāṅgagateṣu granthiṣu lākṣādvirajanīviḍaṅgaśuṇṭhīpūtīdārubhiḥ śiro virecayet dhūmakavalagaṇḍūṣāṃśca sa seveta ||
bahuśaḥ svinnamaṅguṣṭhena veṇuparvaṇā vā śanaiśśanaiḥ punaḥ punarvimardayet |
atha vātaje granthau daśamūlasiddhaṃ mahāsnehaṃ pibet |
pakvaṃ tu vidārya nirastapūyaṃ kṛtvārkādivargāmbhasā prakṣālya tilakalkena sacitrakasaindhavenālepayet |
pittaje raktaje ca jalaukaso nyagrodhādiḥ pradehapariṣekayoḥ padmakādiḥ pāne ca drākṣekṣurasayuktā harītakī virekaḥ |
medojepyayameva vidhiḥ api ca medogranthiṃ tilakalkadigdhaṃ dviguṇapaṭāntaritaṃ taptena phālena darvyā vā jatuliptayā bahuśaḥ pramṛjyāt |
sirāgranthau tvabhinave tailaṃ sāhacaraṃ pibet upanāhañca vātaharairbastikarma ca kuryāt |
śleṣmaje tūrdhvamadhaśca hṛtadoṣasya srutaraktasya ca vamanavirecanadravyaiḥ pralepaḥ |
lepāsvādalobhena ca nilīyamānā makṣikāḥ sa mupekṣeta |
sarvārbudāni ca yadṛcchayā paryāgatāni supariśodhitāni ropayet |
saśeṣadoṣāṇi tu yorbudāni karoti tasyāśu punarbhavanti |
tasmādaśeṣoddharaṇaṃ praśastaṃ kṣāreṇa śastreṇa tathāgninā vā ||
ślīpade tu vātātmake snehasvedopanāhān prayujya gulphasyopariṣṭādvyaṅgule sirāṃ vidhyet |
paittike mṛdurupanāho gulphasyādhaḥ sirāmokṣaḥ pittārbudoktāḥ snehavirekāḥ pittaghnāśca lepāḥ ||
ādārīkākajaṃghākākādanīśukanāsākadambapuṣpabṛhatīdvayamantardhūmaṃ dagdhvā gomūtreṇa bahuśaḥ parisrāvayet tatastat kṣārodakaṃ kṣārakalpena vipacet |
dadyāccātra paratīvāpaṃ phalguśukākhyā madanaphalarasaṃ eṣa kṣāro madhurāhāreṇābhyastaḥ ślīpadāpacīgrahaṇīdoṣārocakān sarvaviṣāṇi ca niyacchati ||
madhūkasāraṃ vā śigruphalāni vā nimbakarañjakaravīrasiddhaṃ vā tailaṃ vairecanikañca dhūmaṃ pibet ||
māṃsīsarjarasakārpāsīphalasaindhavaiḥ stanyapiṣṭaistailaṃ vipakvamabhyaṅgo vraṇakāṭhinyaghnaḥ sarpājagaravase tailaṃ ca samaṃ trayametadapacīghnam |
evamanupaśame vāmapārśvajāyāṃ dakṣiṇajaṅghāpṛṣṭhamadhyādindrabasteradhaḥ ūrdhvaṃ vā śastreṇākṣimātraṃ vraṇaṃ kṛtvā matsyāṇḍajālanibhaṃ medopanīyāgninā dahet |
śalyahetukīṃ pāṭayitvā sarvaśaḥ śalyaṃ viśodhya madhughṛtatilakalkapraticchannāṃ badhnīyāt |
aśastrakṛtyāṃ nāḍyāṃ bhedinyaiṣiṇyānte samudbhidya kṣārāktaṃ sūtraṃ praveśayet |
tadasannidhānetvitarayaiṣiṇyā ca tenānavadīrṇāyāṃ tadanusyūtamanyadanyat kṣārasūtraṃ sañcārayedā gatibhedādayamanapāyo 'bhyupāyaḥ |
sūkṣmānekagatiṣu bhagandareṣu mūleṣu ca chidriteṣu granthyarbudeṣviti |
yā vartyo yāni tailāni tannāḍīṣvapi kalpayet ||
varāhaviṣṭhā ca maṣī sudagdhā tailaplutā sarvagatīrnihanti ||
dhattūrakaṃ madanakodravajañca bījaṃ kośātakī śukanasā mṛgabhojanī ca |
aṅkolajañca kusumaṃ parikalpya cūrṇaṃ lākṣodakāpahṛtadoṣagatau prayojyam ||
sauvaheṣu ca kandeṣu kṛtaṃ vajrāhvayeṣu ca ||
granthayaḥ pañca vā ṣaḍvā kacchapī kacchaponnatāḥ ||
medogarbhā mukhe śūnāṃ tābhyāṃ ca mukhadūṣikā ||
te padmakaṇṭakā jñeyā yaiḥ padmamiva kaṇṭakaiḥ |
sā viddhā vātapittābhyāṃ tābhyāmeva ca gardabhī ||
pittāt bhavanti piṭakāḥ sūkṣmā lājopamā ghanāḥ |
durgandhiṃ rudhiraṃ klinnaṃ nānāvarṇaṃ tato malāḥ |
kṛṣṇaṃ sitaṃ vā sahajaṃ maṇḍalaṃ lāñchanaṃ samam ||
paruṣaṃ paruṣasparśaṃ vyaṅgaṃ śyāvaṃ ca mārutāt |
padmakaṇṭakeṣu nimbāmbuvāntaṃ nimbodakasiddhaṃ sarpiḥ sakṣaudraṃ pāyayet |
agnirohiṇīmapi pratyākhyāya pittavisarpadupācaret pakvāṃ tu madhuravargasiddhena sarpiṣāṃ ropayet ||
pakvāṃ śastreṇa vidārya nimbatilapaṭolakalkena pracchādya badhnīyāt |
balmīkaṃ hastasya pādasya copariṣṭānmarmaṇi vā jātaṃ pravṛddhamatibahucchidrāvṛtaṃ saśophaṃ ca varjayet ||
pakve tu sarvāṃ gatiṃ duṣṭamāṃsāni ca śastreṇa samyakśodhayitvāgninā kṣāreṇa vā dahet ||
tilakālakān maṣāṃśca sūryakāntenāgninā vā dahet kṣāreṇa vā |
tenaiva vā bālāmalakaṃ gomūtreṇa saptāhaṃ sthitam |

tatrāpi vātajeṣu devadārudurālabhābṛhatīmañjiṣṭhāmūrvāpāmārgatrāyantītrāyamāṇāśukanasābalāvidārīyavabadarakulatthabilvotpalaśatāvarīdarbhamūlakvāthe śṛṅgīviḍaṅgagarbhaṃ ghṛtaṃ vipakvamadhobhaktaṃ pānamabhyaṅgaṃ nāvanaṃ ca sāyaṃ yojayet ||
paitteṣu balāmadhukamāgadhikākṣīrakākolīsvaguptāphalakākamācītugāhvābhiḥ sapayaḥ sarpiḥ siddhaṃ pūrvavat prayojayet ||
utkoṭhe pittaśleṣmaharo vidhiḥ sakṣāralavaṇaṃ ca tailamabhyaṅgaḥ |
piṭakā bahavo dīrghā dīryante madhyataśca yāḥ |
nivartate sarugdāhaṃ kvacit pākaṃ ca gacchati ||
vātena dūṣitaṃ carma maṇau saktaṃ ruṇaddhi cet |
bhraṃśaṃ vaṅkṣaṇapārśvādau vyathāṃ gulmaṃ krameṇa ca |
tāṃstāṃśca svān gadān vyāpadvātikī nāma sā smṛtā ||
vamet saruṅnīrujo vā yasyāṃ sā vāminī matā ||
duṣṭo viṣṭabhya yonyāsyaṃ garbhakoṣṭhaṃ ca mārutaḥ |
iti yonigadā nārī yaiḥ śukraṃ na pratīcchati |
tato garbhaṃ na nṛhṇaṇāti rogāṃścāpnoti dāruṇān |
tvacaḥ kṣīridrumāṇāṃ ca triphalāṃ ca pacejjale |
sa kvāthaḥ kṣālanaṃ tena pakvaṃ tailaṃ ca ropaṇam |
na ca yāti yathā pākaṃ prayateta tathā bhṛśam |
pakvaiḥ snāyusirāmāṃsaiḥ prāyo naśyati hi dhvajaḥ ||
tato bhūyaḥ svedayitvā ghṛtenābhyajya śanaiḥ śanaiścarma samānayan maṇimavapīḍayet |
niruddhamaṇau suvarṇādikṛtāṃ dārujāṃ vā jatusṛtāṃ nāḍīmubhayatodvārāṃ snehābhyaktāṃ srotasi praṇidhāya sūkaraśiṃśumārayorvasayāmajjñā vā pariṣecayet |
tṛtīye tṛtīye cāhani nāḍīṃ pīnatarāṃ vidadhyāt |
evamasya srotodvāraṃ vivardhayet snigdhaṃ cāhāraṃ bhojayet |
evamanupaśāntau śastreṇa sevanīṃ parihṛtya dārayitvā sadyaḥkṣatavadupācaret ||
vidāryādisiddhena ca tailena ropayet śarkarārbude raktavidradhivat sādhanam ||
yonivyāpadi tu vātikyāṃ lavaṇatailāktāṃ yoniṃ piṇḍanāḍīkumbhīprabhṛprabhṛtibhiḥ svedayet |
balādroṇadvayaniryūhe payasyāsālaparṇīmāgadhikāśatāvarīkākanāsāśrāvaṇīśarkarājīvanīyagarbhaṃ kṣīracaturguṇaṃ ghṛtatailāḍhakaṃ sādhayet tatpānāt sarvān vātapittavikārānapohati garbhajananaṃ ca ||
śatāvarītriphalāguḍūcīkāśmaryamṛdvīkākāsamardakaparūṣakaharidrādvayasahacaraśukanāsāpunarnavaiḥ kārṣikairghṛtaprasthaḥ siddhaḥ pīto vātajān yonirogānapohati garbhajananaśca ||
tenaivacārjakamūlaṃ bilvayuktaṃ vā pippalī yuktaṃ vā |
rāsnāmālatīcchinnaruhāmadhukabalāvyāghrīdevadārucitrakayūthikāmūlaiḥ karṣāṃśaistailaprasthaḥ samūtro dviguṇapayasā vipakvaḥ picunā praṇīto 'nilārtiharaḥ ||
bastikarma cābhīṣṇaṃ svedaṃ ca prayojayedviśeṣato vātaharaiḥ sukumārabalātailaśirīṣatailaiḥ śatapākasahasra pākaiścānuvāsanamuttarabastiṃ ca |
dhārayecca viplutāyāṃ gomatsyānyatarapittenaikaviṃśatikṛtvo bhāvitān kṣaumanaktakān kiṇvaṃ vā mākṣikayuktamevamasyāḥ srotāṃsi viśudhyanti kaṇḍūkledaśophāśca nivartante ||
udāvṛttāyāmānūpamāṃsarasāḥ kṣīraṃ svedo daśamūlatrivṛtākvāthakalkāsiddhaśca snehaḥ pānānuvāsanottarabastiṣu |
sannipāte vimiśraṃ tu saṃsṛṣṭāsu ca kārayet ||
snigdhasvinnāṃ tathā yoniṃ duḥsthitāṃ sthāpayet samām |
pāṇinā namayet jihmāṃ saṃvṛtāṃ prathayet punaḥ ||
śītāḥ pittajitaḥ kāryāḥ snehanārthaṃ ghṛtāni ca ||
garbhadaṃ pittajānāṃ ca rogāṇāṃ paramaṃ hitam ||
tilacūrṇaṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ phāṇitaṃ saukarī vasā |
satārkṣyaśailaṃ lākṣāṃ vā chāgena payasā pibet |
madhukaṃ triphalāṃ lodhraṃ mustaṃ saurāṣṭrikāṃ madhu |
doṣā jantukṛtā ye ca bālānāṃ tāṃśca nāśayet ||
tailaṃ kvāthena tasyaiva kāryaṃ dhāryaṃ ca pūrvavat ||
dhāryā madhukṛtā vartiḥ kaṣāyāṇāṃ ca bhūriśaḥ ||
durgandhānāṃ kaṣāyaḥ syāttailaṃ vā kalka eva vā |
evaṃ yoniṣu śuddhāsu garbhaṃ vindanti yoṣitaḥ |
dve niśe madhukaṃ medā dīpyakaḥ kaṭurohiṇī ||
āyuṣyaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ medhyaṃ dhanyaṃ puṃsavanaṃ param ||
phalasarpiriti khyātaṃ puṣpe pītaṃ phalāya yat |
purā khalvamṛtārthaṃ surāsuraiḥ salilanidhervimathyamānāt krodha iva rūpavān satvaṃ samudvabhūva kṛṣṇamanalanayanamūrdhvapradīptakeśaṃ daṃṣṭrākarālaṃ bhairavārāvarūpam |
tat sahasaiva sarvabhūtāni nirdagdhukāmamupayogaviśeṣairviṣamamṛtatāṃ vinayamāno brahmānunīyauṣadhiṣu nyastavān ||
sarvameva ca sthāvaraṃ jvarahidhmādantaharṣahanustambhagalagrahaphenavamanāruciśvāsamūrcchāḥ karoti viśeṣeṇa kandajam |
tatra taikṣṇyauṣṇyāt pittaṃ raktaṃ ca prakopayati |
ata eva ca prayatnenānnāni viṣato rakṣedityuktam |
viṣaṃ hi dehaṃ samprāpya prāgdūṣayati śoṇitam |
viṣaṃ yaddoṣabhūyiṣṭhaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ prāk prapadyate |
daṃśe tiṣṭhati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ sarvataḥ piṇḍitaṃ viṣam |
yathāsvaṃ bhakṣite pīḍā yathāsvaṃ ca kriyākramaḥ ||
pañcame pāṇḍujihvāsya śoṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhe hṛdi vyathā |
saptame maraṇaṃ vega iti gagnajito matam ||
dhātvantareṣu yāḥ sapta kalāḥ pūrvaṃ prakīrttitāḥ |
svabhāvato vā na guṇaiḥ suyuktaṃ dūṣīviṣākhyāṃ viṣamabhyupaiti ||
bhavennaro dhvasthīśaroruhāṅgo vilūnapakṣaḥ sa yathā vihaṅgaḥ |
jihvāyāḥ śyāvatā stambho mūrcchā trāsaḥ klamo vamiḥ ||
dvitīye vepathuḥ svedo kaṇṭhe ca vedanāḥ |
viṣaṃ cāmāśayaṃ prāptaṃ kurute hṛdi vedanām ||
durbale harite śūne jāyete cāsya locane ||
mūrdhni kākapadaṃ kṛtvā sāsṛgvā piśitaṃ kṣipet ||
sarveṣu sarvāvastheṣu ye viṣeṣu paraṃ hitāḥ ||
candanaṃ kuṅkumaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kāṅkṣī lākṣā priyaṅgavaḥ |
candanaṃ vālakaṃ mustaṃ dhyāmakaṃ kaṭukā natam |
karkaṭī pūtanā keśī śvetā ca girikarṇikā |
pippalīṃ pāṭalīṃ padmāṃ śvetāṃ ca girikarṇikām |
phalīnīṃ kiṇihīṃ ceti gavāṃ pittena bhāvayet |
sūryodayo hanti viṣaṃ tamaḥ sūryodayo yathā ||
priyaṅgu tagaraṃ lākṣā mañjiṣṭhā madhukaṃ madhu |
raktā nataṃ vacā dantī śivaḥ śivakṛto 'gadaḥ ||
eṣa māheśvaro yogo na kvacit pratihanyate ||
śūyate pacyate sadyo gatvā māṃsaṃ ca kṛṣṇatām |
viṣāṇāṃ cālpavīryāṇāṃ yogo gara iti smṛtaḥ ||
manyate kṛṣṇamātmānaṃ gauro gauraṃ ca kālakaḥ |
vibhajya yojayet ūrdhvamadhaḥ saṃśodhitaṃ ca tam |
te 'pi ca vratahīnasya hīnā vā svaravarṇataḥ |
āśaye yasya doṣasya viṣaṃ tiṣṭhati taṃ punaḥ |
svedo vātāśaye dadhnā pānaṃ ca natakuṣṭhayoḥ ||
divyā garjanti varṣanti dyotante dyotayanti te ||
dveśate viṃśatī dve ca sā sūte tatra jāyate |
astaṃgate ravau śūdrāḥ daśanti brāhmaṇāḥ puraḥ |
saṃsthitā dakṣiṇe pārśve kṣatriyā vāmato viśaḥ ||
daṃṣṭrāpade sarakte dve vyāluptaṃ trīṇi tāni tu ||
kadācit kurute śophaṃ sarpāṅgābhihataṃ tu tat ||
tudyate grathitaḥ kiñcit kaṇḍūmān dahyate bhṛśam |
rogī kumāryā vāme tu garbhiṇyā kṛṣṇajihvadṛk ||
śyāvatā tena vaktrādau sarpantīva ca kīṭakāḥ ||
dāho hidhmā ca ṣaṣṭhe tu hṛtpīḍā gātragauravam ||
pāṇḍutā tena gātrāṇāṃ dvitīye gurutāti ca ||
kuryāt pañcasu vegeṣu cikitsāṃ na tataḥ param ||
na teṣāṃ kālaniyamo na ca vegeṣvanukramaḥ ||
nairṛtākhye muhūrte ca daṣṭaṃ marmasu ca tyajet ||
hidhmā śvāso vamiḥ kāso daṣṭamātrasya dehinaḥ |
jāyate yugapadyasya sa hṛcchūlī na jīvati ||
raktaṃ khebhyaḥ samastebhyo vartate na tu daṃśataḥ ||
rakṣan kaṇṭhagatān prāṇān viṣamāśu śamaṃ nayet ||
mātrāśataṃ viṣaṃ sthitvā daṃśe daṣṭasya dehinaḥ |
kuryācchīghraṃ yathā dehe viṣavallī na rohati ||
loṣṭaṃ mahīṃ vā daśanaiśchitvā vānu sasambhramam ||
aśaktaḥ śithilo rodhduṃ viṣaṃ deśāntaraṃ vrajat ||
karoti bhasmasāt sadyo vahniḥ ki nāma na kṣaṇāt ||
viṣe pravisṛte vidhyet sirāṃ sā paramā kriyā ||
rakte nirddriyamāṇe hi kṛtsnaṃ nirddriyate viṣam |
aikadhyaṃ pañcagavyaṃ vā dadhi gairikavāri vā ||
sakṣaudro himavān nāma hanti maṇḍalināṃ viṣam |
mañjiṣṭhāṃ madhukaṃ ceti daṣṭo maṇḍalinā pibet ||
raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ca godhāyāḥ śuṣkaṃ cūrṇīkṛtaṃ hitam |
saindhavaṃ cāñjanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ gavāṃ pittena kalkitam ||
pippalīṃ ca samaṃ piṣṭvā gavyapittena pāyayet ||
viṣaṃ hi netraṃ rūkṣasya tīkṣṇairhanti samīritam ||
atha darvīkṛtāṃ vege pūrve visrāvya śoṇitam |
māṃsaṃ sarudhiraṃ tasya carma vā tatra nikṣipet ||
tṛtīye vāmitaḥ peyāṃ vege maṇḍalināṃ pibet |
tvaṅmanohvā niśe vakraṃ rasaḥ śārdūlajo nakhaḥ |
jyotiṣmatī nataṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śvetā ca girikarṇikā ||
bilvasya mūlaṃ surasasya puṣpaṃ phalaṃ karañjasya nataṃ surāhvam |
phalatrayaṃ vyoṣaniśādvayaṃ ca bastasya mūtreṇa susūkṣmapiṣṭam ||
maṃjiṣṭhā tryūṣaṇaṃ tadvat kalkayet sa mahāgadaḥ ||
bhūyo vegāya jāyeta śeṣaṃ dūṣīviṣāya vā ||
sitā vaigandhiko drākṣā payasyā madhukaṃ madhu |
śastraṃ dūrvāṃ madhu ghṛtaṃ kuryāddaṣṭasya mūrddhataḥ |
tathā droṇaṃ mahādroṇaṃ mānasīṃ sarpajaṃ maṇim |
daṃśo daṣṭaḥ satṛṇnidro mūrcchāvān haritaṃ vamet ||
kledī ca daṃśo daṣṭasya hṛspīḍā granthisambhavaḥ ||
mandāḥ pītāḥ sitāḥ śyāvā rukṣāḥ karburamecakāḥ |
nṛkeśāḥ sarṣapāḥ pītā guḍo jīrṇaśca dhūpanam |
viṣaghnaṃ ca vidhiṃ sarvaṃ kuryāt saṃśodhanāni ca ||
yāti kīṭaviṣaiḥ kampaṃ na kailāsa ivānilaiḥ ||
dhūpo hanti kṛtaḥ śīghraṃ kīṭavṛścikajaṃ viṣam ||
dve bale nākulīṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śirīṣaṃ rajanīdvayam ||
rohītakaṃ ca pittena kalkayet sa varo 'gadaḥ |
sitāsite ca lavaṇe maricaṃ ca sanāgaram |
lepaḥ sukhoṣṇaśca hitaḥ piṇyāko gomayopi vā ||
ādaṃśe yasya kaṇḍūḥsyāt kothaḥ koṭhaṃ ca dāruṇam |
vego viṣasya pañcāhānnaiva vā kriyayā vinā ||
indriyārthaṃ na jānāti prasvidyati ca yo muhuḥ |
kuṭajasya phalaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ mālatī phalinī natam |
svedaleśāḥ smṛtā lūtā lūne ye patitāstṛṇe ||
ye sphuliṅgā viniśceruste lūtā iti kecana ||
tatra ghoratamā lūtā bhidyante tā api tridhā |
saptāhena daśāhena pakṣeṇa ca paraṃ kramāt ||
tā daśanti site pakṣe 'site sandhau sadaiva ca ||
taddūṣitaṃ ca vastrādi dehe pṛktaṃ vikārakṛt ||
ṣaṣṭhe vyāpnoti marmāṇi saptame hanti jīvita ||
prasṛtaṃ sarvato daṃśaṃ na chindīta dahet vā ||
śastaḥ paryuṣito lepaḥ saghṛtaḥ paittike varṇe ||
āsphoṭagundrā ca hitā pralepaḥ ślaiṣmike viṣe ||
śigrupāṭhā kuśavṛṣaṃ vidulaṃ ca jale pacet |
kanīyaḥ paścamūlaṃ ca tasmin maṇḍaṃ pacet ghṛtāt ||
jīvantī laśunaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ katakaṃ mārkavaṃ natam ||
pāne pralepe seke ca lūtāsu paramaṃ hitaḥ ||
surālā kaṭabhī jātiḥ śvetā ca girikarṇikā ||
